['', 'Use software engineering best practices to ensure a high standard of quality for all team deliverables.', 'Programming experience with at least one modern language such as Java or C# including object-oriented design.', 'Strong verbal and written communication skills, are self-driven and deliver high quality results in a fast-paced environment.', 'Ability to take a project from scoping requirements to launch to delivery', 'Sample future items in our Test Kitchen', "It's Set Up To Be a Global Hub That Cultivates Collaboration", "Qualifications</strong5+ years of non-internship professional software development experience.Programming experience with at least one modern language such as Java or C# including object-oriented design.2+ years of experience contributing to the architecture and design (architecture, design patterns, reliability and scaling) of new and current systems.Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related field or equivalent years of experience.Proven knowledge of Computer Science fundamentals (object-oriented design, data structures and algorithm.Strong verbal and written communication skills, are self-driven and deliver high quality results in a fast-paced environment.Proven leadership abilities in an engineering environment in driving operational perfection and best practices.Highly quantitative with great judgment and passion for building a great customer experience.Ability to take a project from scoping requirements to launch to deliveryAdditional Information</strongMcDonald’s is proud to be one of the most recognized brands in the world, with restaurants in over 100 countries that serve 70 million customers daily. As the global leader in the food service industry, our legacy of innovation and hard work continues to drive us.From drive thru updates to delivery to mobile order and pay, we are innovating quickly and growing. Joining McDonald's means thinking big and preparing for a career that can have influence around the world.At McDonald’s, we see every day as a chance to create positive impact. We lead through our values centered on inclusivity, service, integrity, community and family. From support of Ronald McDonald House Charities to our Youth Opportunity project and sustainability initiatives, our values keep us dedicated to using our scale for good: good for our customers, people, industry and planet. We also offer outstanding benefits including a sabbatical program, tuition assistance and flexible work arrangements.It's Set Up To Be a Global Hub That Cultivates CollaborationWhile most of us are working remote during COVID-19, we're excited to get back to our state-of-the-art headquarters in the booming West Loop of downtown Chicago.Take a class at Hamburger UniversitySample future items in our Test KitchenUtilize the latest technology to connect with your team around the globeWe are an equal opportunity employer committed to the diversity of our crew members, staff, operators, and suppliers. ['', 'About DAT', 'Bonus Skills', 'For additional information, see www.DAT.com/company\xa0', 'Masters or higher degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Physics, Economics, or other STEM disciplines.\xa0Proficiency in word processing, spreadsheet, and presentation creation tools, as well as Internet research tools.\xa0Good communication skills and strong business presence.\xa0At least 2 years of experience in data-driven analysis using stats packages in Python or R.At least 2 years of regular usage of relational databases and data structuresStrong ability to code in Python, SQL, and R.Experience in developing production level code in those languages.Mathematical background sufficient to support the development and evaluation of appropriate business algorithms.', 'Masters or higher degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Physics, Economics, or other STEM disciplines.\xa0', 'At least 2 years of experience in data-driven analysis using stats packages in Python or R.', 'Individual will also be able to support the full stack of required technologies for deployment of data-science solutions.', 'Strong ability to code in Python, SQL, and R.', 'Conduct relevant research, data analysis, and create reports\xa0for internal clients.', 'DAT Software and Analytics is a next-generation SaaS technology company that has been at the leading edge of innovation in transportation supply chain logistics for 43 years. We continue to transform the industry year over year, by deploying a suite of software solutions to millions of customers every day - customers who depend on DAT for the most relevant data and most accurate insights to help them make smarter business decisions and run their companies more profitably. We operate the largest marketplace of its kind in North America, with 226 million freight posts in 2020, and a database of $126 billion of annual global shipment market transaction data. DAT is based in Beaverton, OR, with offices in Colorado, Missouri, Texas, and Bangalore, India.', 'Data Scientist I ', 'DAT Software and Analytics offers competitive compensation and an excellent benefit package that includes medical, dental, and vision coverage, flexible savings accounts, 401K, Life and AD&D insurance, a comprehensive Paid Leave program, and a Tuition Reimbursement program.', 'DAT Software and Analytics ', '\xa0', 'Capable of independently developing statistical and machine learning models in R. and/or Python to solve pressing business problems in the software as a service spaceParticipate and lead team problem solving efforts and offer ideas to solve internal client issues.Conduct relevant research, data analysis, and create reports\xa0for internal clients.Individual will be responsible for quantitative analysis of structured, semi-structured, and unstructured data working in small teams or independently to develop, test, and harden advanced analytical models as required.Individual will also be able to support the full stack of required technologies for deployment of data-science solutions.', 'Individual will be responsible for quantitative analysis of structured, semi-structured, and unstructured data working in small teams or independently to develop, test, and harden advanced analytical models as required.', 'Exceptional attention to detail and proven ability to identify process improvement opportunities\xa0Advanced statistics and machine learning/NLP techniques and algorithms using R, Python, Java on ML platforms such as Spark, H20 etc.\xa0', 'Advanced statistics and machine learning/NLP techniques and algorithms using R, Python, Java on ML platforms such as Spark, H20 etc.\xa0', 'The Data Science team is charged with creating an environment at DAT where data is treated as a critical business asset.\xa0Our Data Scientists are part of the Data Science team and report to the Data Science Manager.', 'Proficiency in word processing, spreadsheet, and presentation creation tools, as well as Internet research tools.\xa0', 'DAT Software and Analytics', 'Good communication skills and strong business presence.\xa0', 'DAT Software and Analytics will not consider unsolicited résumés from vendors including search firms, fee-based referral services, and/or recruitment agencies.', 'Capable of independently developing statistical and machine learning models in R. and/or Python to solve pressing business problems in the software as a service space', 'Mathematical background sufficient to support the development and evaluation of appropriate business algorithms.', 'The Skills You’ll Need:', 'Exceptional attention to detail and proven ability to identify process improvement opportunities\xa0', 'DAT Software and Analytics embraces the value of a diverse workforce, and believes it is a core strength of our company that we encourage those values in every DAT employee, at every level of our organization, regardless of tenure or rank. We provide equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, disability, genetic information, marital status, amnesty, or status as a covered veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state, and local laws.', 'DAT Solutions is seeking a Data Scientist I to join our growing Data Science team in Beaverton, Oregon.', 'Our Data Scientists are responsible for working with internal stakeholders to address a wide variety of data objectives – from traditional business intelligence to aid in the development of sophisticated models to be part of our products to addressing strategic questions, etc.\xa0', 'Experience in developing production level code in those languages.', 'What You’ll Do', 'All referrals and résumés are managed exclusively through the Human Resources Department.', 'Participate and lead team problem solving efforts and offer ideas to solve internal client issues.', 'At least 2 years of regular usage of relational databases and data structures']

['', 'Our mission is to help local businesses thrive in a digital world. Founded in 2011, Womply is a local commerce platform that provides apps, APIs, marketing, and financial tools to make local commerce happen for over 500,000 American businesses and their customers. All of Womply’s products and services are powered by the Womply Commerce Graph, a proprietary data asset that offers the most complete view of local commerce.\xa0', 'MUST HAVE - Experience delivering Spark-based data consumption to consumer facing products / systems.', 'MUST HAVE - Data Platform and Pipeline experience', 'Machine Learning and AI experience', 'Experience mentoring engineers in best practices and methods.', 'We’re a fanatically values-based company with $50 million raised to accelerate our growth. Womply is a remote-first company with one physical office in Lehi, Utah. We’re always looking for top talent in product, engineering, DevOps, design, data science, sales, marketing, business development, account management, and more. If you want to make a big impact, let’s talk. Learn more at www.womply.com/careers.\xa0', 'Individuals seeking employment at Womply are considered without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, physical or mental disability, veteran status, or sexual orientation.', 'Experience with PCI data practices', 'Experience with distributed and federated systems and data processing pipelines', 'Strong background in SQL, Data Modeling, and Performance Tuning in both relational and noSQL databases.', '\xa0', 'Nice to have:', '7+ years of experience in software engineering with experience as a senior contributor or team lead.MUST HAVE - Good programming skills in Java or Scala.MUST HAVE - Experience delivering Spark-based data consumption to consumer facing products / systems.MUST HAVE - Data Platform and Pipeline experienceMachine Learning and AI experienceExperience with Cassandra, Mongo, or similar data stores.Strong background in SQL, Data Modeling, and Performance Tuning in both relational and noSQL databases.Experience with distributed and federated systems and data processing pipelinesFamiliarity with monitoring, backup, and disaster recovery of data systemsExperience building POCs, architecting new systems and improving existing systems to solve business problems and support scaling', 'Database Administration Experience.', 'AWS experience', 'MUST HAVE - Good programming skills in Java or Scala.', "In your new role as Principal Software Engineer at Womply you will be lead a team of engineers working to manage our ever\xad-growing collection of payment and other merchant data from across the USA. You’ll work primarily with Java and Apache Spark and a variety of data stores including Cassandra, PostgreSQL, and Aurora. You’ll work with the rest of the engineering and product teams to design and optimize the schemas needed to support the products. Going forward, you'll support our evaluations of new tools and technologies to scale and analyze our data.", 'Experience building POCs, architecting new systems and improving existing systems to solve business problems and support scaling', 'PLEASE NOTE - Direct applicants ONLY. Any recruiter/3rd party submissions we receive will be considered a gift.', 'You Must Have:', 'Java and Apache Spark', 'Familiarity with monitoring, backup, and disaster recovery of data systems', '7+ years of experience in software engineering with experience as a senior contributor or team lead.', 'Experience with Cassandra, Mongo, or similar data stores.', 'Come build something amazing at Womply', 'Experience with Python / Pyspark', 'Experience generating and evaluating data quality metrics', 'AWS experienceDatabase Administration Experience.Experience with Python / PysparkExperience generating and evaluating data quality metricsExperience mentoring engineers in best practices and methods.Experience with PCI data practices']

Biotech & start-up experience a strong plus (Degree in: Statistics, Computer Science, Neuroscience, Engineering, Mathematics, Physics or related)', 'Ability to work in the US', 'Familiar with R Shiny and/or other modern front-end development and data visualization technologies', 'Understanding of a variety of statistical and/or machine learning methods (regression, statistical hypothesis testing and design of experiments, tree-based algorithms, supervised vs unsupervised learning). Expert knowledge in a selection of several key areas', 'Background in EEG, fMRI, and other brain measurement technologies a strong plus', 'Note that we are not able to sponsor employment visas at this time, and therefore can only accept applications from people who have employment rights in the US.', 'Experience with Tensorflow/Keras and/or Pytorch. Previous background in NLP and/or computer vision a strong plus', 'Develop algorithms & analyses that incorporate digital and traditional biomarkers (voice, vision, smart device, EEG, others) in order to improve the treatment process via more accurate intervention, personalized therapeutics or real time post-treatment follow up', 'The Data Scientist will support a diverse set of initiatives including statistical computational modelling, advanced analytics and AI projects. You will partner with internal and external stakeholders to develop insights and models to advance discoveries in mental health care.\xa0', 'Provide expertise company-wide ranging from data science & analytics to more traditional statistical and computer science analysis in order to improve the patient journey and provide mission-critical applications as COMPASS grows', 'COMPASS Pathways is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All employment decisions are based on business needs, job requirements, and individual qualifications, without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, and related medical conditions), ethnicity, age, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, military service, genetic information, familial or marital status, or any other status, category, or characteristic protected by applicable law.', 'Roles and responsibilities', 'Industry experience as a data scientist in a digital health organisation, pharma, or biotech', 'Detailed responsibilities/accountabilities ', 'Comfortable with Linux and the AWS cloud environment', 'Equal opportunities ', 'US applicants', 'Work closely with stakeholders to identify quantitative and technological needs for various COMPASS projects', 'COMPASS Pathways is a mental health care company dedicated to accelerating patient access to evidence-based innovation in mental health (https://compasspathways.com). Our focus is on improving the lives of those who are suffering with mental health challenges and who are not helped by current treatments. We are pioneering the development of a new model of psilocybin therapy, in which our proprietary formulation of synthetic psilocybin, COMP360, is administered in conjunction with psychological support.', 'Additional qualifications - preferred', 'Strong alignment with core company mission and values Compassionate, Bold, Rigorous, and Inclusive', 'Experience in modern front-end development and data visualisation', 'Job overview', 'Ability to operate independently and in cross-functional teams in an entrepreneurial and rapid growth-oriented environment', 'Proficient in at least one of Python (scikit-learn, numpy, pandas, matplotlib) or R (tidyr, dplyr, ggplot2, Rstudio)', 'Profile', 'How to apply', 'Strong analytical, project management, written and verbal communication skills', 'The position reports into the VP of Digital Health Research', 'If interested, please send your CV and statement of interest to hiring@compasspathways.com']

['', 'Heap is built on a rich dataset of product activity, encompassing hundreds of billions of events across thousands of websites. We’ve automated the process of capturing user behavior, and now we’re now building the next generation of tools to help clients understand and take action on their data.', 'People are what make Heap awesome. Regardless of age, education, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, or any personal characteristics, we want everyone to feel welcome. We are committed to building a diverse and inclusive equal opportunity workplace everyone can call home.', 'Research and develop novel product features. You’ll be solving challenging technical and statistical problems that automate insights for Heap users.Test prototypes with clients. You’ll pair directly with clients to understand their data and business problems, in order to test methods and product features in practice.Productize and scale. You’ll partner with our engineers, designers, and product managers to turn new ideas into practical and statistically rigorous features in the Heap product.Level up Heap’s data science capabilities. We’re developing data science as a core competency of Heap. As an early and senior member of the team, you’ll help build and scale our technical infrastructure and lead an initiative that’s key to the company’s long-term strategy.', 'In this role, you’ll research, develop, and productize advanced features for Heap’s product analytics platform. These features will guide users’ attention towards “unknown unknowns” in their data, suggest the right questions to ask, and otherwise decrease the barriers to insights. This is an opportunity to scale your data science knowledge across hundreds of companies: instead of discovering important business insights for one company at a time, here you can turn your knowledge into a product that helps thousands of product managers at once.', 'Research and develop novel product features. You’ll be solving challenging technical and statistical problems that automate insights for Heap users.', "Heap has raised $95M in funding from NEA, Y Combinator, Menlo Ventures, SVAngel, Sam Altman, Garry Tan, Alexis Ohanian, Harj Taggar, Ram Shriram, and others. We offer plenty of awesome benefits, and we were named #1 on Glassdoor’s Best Places to Work (SMB). We'd love to hear from you!", 'Strong communication skills: able to collaborate with technical, nontechnical and external stakeholders, including presenting conclusions to clients.', '4+ years of professional experience as a data scientist', 'As Heap’s second data scientist, you’ll work directly with our CTO and alongside an expert data scientist and engineer on a fast-moving team. As you develop these methods, you’ll partner directly with our clients to test your approaches on a variety of datasets. This project is central to Heap’s future strategy and to our continued success as the leading product analytics platform.', 'Practical: you care about finding effective and robust approaches that can be scaled into products, not about using the newest and shiniest technologies.\xa0', 'An advanced degree (PhD, MS) in a quantitative field is optional but preferred.', 'Research and develop novel product features. ', 'Productize and scale. ', 'You’ll iterate quickly on challenging and interesting technical problems. How can we turn an autocaptured dataset of millions of events into quantifiable insights? How can we automatically identify frustrating aspects of a customer’s product? How can we help our clients avoid overfitting, and protect them from being fooled by confounding factors?', 'Expertise in either R or Python. You’re fluent in transforming, modeling, and visualizing data to solve a variety of problems.', 'Level up Heap’s data science capabilities. We’re developing data science as a core competency of Heap. As an early and senior member of the team, you’ll help build and scale our technical infrastructure and lead an initiative that’s key to the company’s long-term strategy.', 'Test prototypes with clients. You’ll pair directly with clients to understand their data and business problems, in order to test methods and product features in practice.', 'What you will be doing:', 'You prefer rapid iteration, and have an interest in proving out ideas and making decisions in as fast a loop as possible.', 'Test prototypes with clients. ', '4+ years of professional experience as a data scientistExpertise in either R or Python. You’re fluent in transforming, modeling, and visualizing data to solve a variety of problems.Comfortable in SQL. Experience with data warehouses such as Snowflake, Redshift or BigQuery is a plus.Experienced with statistics and machine learning. You’re familiar with dangers like overfitting, confounding factors, and multiple hypothesis testing, and you’re well-versed in statistical methods for handling such risks.Practical: you care about finding effective and robust approaches that can be scaled into products, not about using the newest and shiniest technologies.\xa0An advanced degree (PhD, MS) in a quantitative field is optional but preferred.Strong communication skills: able to collaborate with technical, nontechnical and external stakeholders, including presenting conclusions to clients.You prefer rapid iteration, and have an interest in proving out ideas and making decisions in as fast a loop as possible.You can have a lot of fun playing with data.', 'Productize and scale. You’ll partner with our engineers, designers, and product managers to turn new ideas into practical and statistically rigorous features in the Heap product.', 'Comfortable in SQL. Experience with data warehouses such as Snowflake, Redshift or BigQuery is a plus.', 'Experienced with statistics and machine learning. You’re familiar with dangers like overfitting, confounding factors, and multiple hypothesis testing, and you’re well-versed in statistical methods for handling such risks.', 'You can have a lot of fun playing with data.', 'What we’re looking for:\xa0', 'Level up Heap’s data science capabilities. ']

A relevant degree or its foreign equivalent is required.']

['', 'Responsibilities:', 'Antuit.ai', 'The successful candidate will have strong verbal and written communication skills and effectively communicate with the client and internal team. A strong understanding of databases, SQL, cloud technologies, and modern data integration and orchestration tools like Azure Data Factory (ADF), Informatica, and Airflow are required to succeed in this role.\xa0', "Lead design sessions to develop ETL logic that meets business and product requirements.Implement data pipelines that meet the design and are efficient, scalable, and maintainable.Provide technical guidance and meet best practices during the data pipeline development.Work with clients to understand and document their data, technology, and how it would integrate with Antuit's cloud solutions.Act as a technical escalation lead for customer and development team issues.", 'Act as a technical escalation lead for customer and development team issues.', '7-10 years as a data integration engineer (or equivalent) with at least 3 years as a senior data integration engineerStrong understanding of data models that feed advanced AI-driven applications.At least 3 years of experience with Azure Data Factory (ADF), Informatica and similar, is critical.At least 1 year of Spark experience (preferably PySpark)Experience with relational databases, SQL, and Python is preferred.Experience working with Retail, Consumer Goods, and Manufacturing data models is a plus.', 'Antuit.ai is interested in hiring a Senior Data Integration Engineer to work closely with clients and the product engineering and AI teams to create data pipelines to support data-driven AI-based cloud applications.', 'Take part in Information Security training and act accordingly while handling information.', 'Understand and adhere to Information Security policies, guidelines, and procedures and practice them to protect organizational data and Information systems.', 'Strong understanding of data models that feed advanced AI-driven applications.', 'EEOC', '\xa0', 'Job Location: Remote - US / Canada ', "A Senior Data Integration Engineer will be responsible for understanding the client's technical requirements, design and build data pipelines to support the requirements. In this role, the Sr. Data Integration Engineer, besides developing the solution, will also oversee other Engineers' development.", '"Antuit.ai thanks all applicants; however, only those selected for an interview will be contacted.\xa0"', "Antuit.ai\xa0is the leader in AI-powered SaaS solutions, empowering world-class Consumer Products and Retail companies to digitally transform their supply chain, merchandising, marketing and omnichannel operations. Antuit.ai's executives, comprised of industry leaders from SAP, SAS, IBM, and Accenture, and our team of Ph.Ds., data scientists, technologists, and domain experts are passionate about generating real value for our clients. Antuit is funded by Goldman Sachs and Zodius Capital.", 'Lead design sessions to develop ETL logic that meets business and product requirements.', '7-10 years as a data integration engineer (or equivalent) with at least 3 years as a senior data integration engineer', 'Report all suspected security and policy breaches to the Infosec team or appropriate authority (CISO).', 'Experience with relational databases, SQL, and Python is preferred.', 'Provide technical guidance and meet best practices during the data pipeline development.', 'Responsibilities include, but are not limited to the following:', 'Antuit.ai is an at-will, equal opportunity employer.\xa0We consider applicants for all positions without regard to race, color, religion, national origin or ancestry, gender identity, sex, age, marital status, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected status under local, state, or federal law.', 'Qualifications and Skills:', 'The Role:', 'About antuit.ai', 'At least 3 years of experience with Azure Data Factory (ADF), Informatica and similar, is critical.', 'Implement data pipelines that meet the design and are efficient, scalable, and maintainable.', 'Experience working with Retail, Consumer Goods, and Manufacturing data models is a plus.', "Work with clients to understand and document their data, technology, and how it would integrate with Antuit's cloud solutions.", 'Information Security Responsibilities', 'At least 1 year of Spark experience (preferably PySpark)']

job_title: Data Scientist, Health Economics and Analytics
job_text: ['Perform descriptive and advanced statistical analyses using large patient and/or claims databases in support of data mining, predictive modeling, and health outcomes research projectsLead evidence creation through HEOR scientific studies, including large-scale real-world evidence (RWE) studies and health economic analyses.Author study reports, scientific publications, conference abstracts, and postersDevelop new data visualization methods to convey insight to the risk and health of patients on multiple medications.Participate in the implementation and configuration of data visualization software such as Tableau or LookerHelp develop project plans, execute on deliverables within agreed upon timeframes, manage deadlines, communicate progress and make recommendations to address issues.', '', 'OneOme Headquarters, 807 Broadway St NE, Suite 100, Minneapolis, MN 55413', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Author study reports, scientific publications, conference abstracts, and posters', 'Experience and interest in presenting analytic findings to business customers. Familiar with reporting and visualization tools, such as Tableau, Power BI, Business Objects, etc.', 'MS or Ph.D. in Public Health, Economics, Biostatistics, Epidemiology, Data Science or similar areas of academic training is required.', 'Detail oriented, excellent quantitative, written, and oral communication skills.', 'POSITION LOCATION', 'The Data Scientist, Health Economics and Analytics role will aid in the research and development of novel methods for identifying medication optimization opportunities for patients with high risk/costs. In addition, they will be involved in the development, implementation and testing of data visualization tools and reports.\xa0The ideal candidate will have healthcare data analytics experience and a history of conducting real world evidence and/or health economic studies.', 'Lead evidence creation through HEOR scientific studies, including large-scale real-world evidence (RWE) studies and health economic analyses.', 'ABOUT OneOme', 'WORK ENVIRONMENT', '\xa0', 'The data analytics and health outcomes team is responsible for developing and implementing research and analytical solutions for pharmacogenomic guided medication optimization in a population-based approach.\xa0Real world evidence studies, mathematical models, and data visualization techniques aid in the identification of opportunities and risk within large populations, primarily relying on use of historic pharmacy and medical claims data.', 'Minimum of 3 years of experience in health economics and/or outcomes research that focuses on calculating total cost of care and savings related to population health interventions.', 'Fast Company’s', 'Comfortable with the command line/Unix systems.', 'Develop new data visualization methods to convey insight to the risk and health of patients on multiple medications.', 'OSHA RISK FACTOR CATEGORY 1. The employee is regularly required to talk or hear. The employee frequently is required to stand, walk; sit; and use hands to finger, handle, or feel, and work with a computer. The employee is occasionally required to reach with hands and arms; climb or balance; stoop, kneel, crouch, or crawl; and smell. The employee must occasionally lift up to 50 pounds and/or carry objects weighing up to 25 pounds. The employee is required to perform repetitive motions, including reaching above the head, and typing. Specific vision abilities required by this job include peripheral vision, depth perception, and ability to adjust focus. Color-blindness testing is required for those with job-specific duties requiring color discrimination.', 'Solid foundation in applied mathematics, such as: statistics, linear algebra, optimization.', 'Perform descriptive and advanced statistical analyses using large patient and/or claims databases in support of data mining, predictive modeling, and health outcomes research projects', '5+ years of experience using statistical software packages such as SAS, R, Python, and/or STATA', 'Prior experience with classical Machine Learning Algorithms preferred.', 'MS or Ph.D. in Public Health, Economics, Biostatistics, Epidemiology, Data Science or similar areas of academic training is required.Minimum of 3 years of experience in health economics and/or outcomes research that focuses on calculating total cost of care and savings related to population health interventions.Solid foundation in applied mathematics, such as: statistics, linear algebra, optimization.Experience and interest in presenting analytic findings to business customers. Familiar with reporting and visualization tools, such as Tableau, Power BI, Business Objects, etc.5+ years of experience using statistical software packages such as SAS, R, Python, and/or STATA3+ years of SQL programming experienceDetail oriented, excellent quantitative, written, and oral communication skills.Comfortable with the command line/Unix systems.Experience with genomics preferredPrior experience with classical Machine Learning Algorithms preferred.', 'The Data Scientist, Health Economics and Analytics role will use various analytical approaches to develop unique solutions to complex business problems. Candidate must have a strong work ethic, intellectual curiosity, and a desire to work hard and have fun.', 'Participate in the implementation and configuration of data visualization software such as Tableau or Looker', 'QUALIFICATIONS', 'ROLE DESCRIPTION', 'We are a precision medicine leader, providing evidence-based pharmacogenomic solutions that facilitate more personalized prescriptions across the globe. Our RightMed solution helps healthcare organizations, providers, and payers optimize patient outcomes and reduce costs by facilitating more personalized prescriptions. Paired with an in-house CLIA-certified, CAP-accredited lab, OneOme’s RightMed test provides powerful genetic insights that doctors, pharmacists, and other healthcare providers can use to help inform medication decisions for their patients.\xa0Our mission is to provide the most cost-effective, comprehensive, personalized, pharmacogenomics analysis integrated into patients’ everyday clinical care.\xa0OneOme was named one of Fast Company’s 50 Most Innovative Companies of 2018.', 'Experience with genomics preferred', '3+ years of SQL programming experience', 'Help develop project plans, execute on deliverables within agreed upon timeframes, manage deadlines, communicate progress and make recommendations to address issues.']

['', 'Responsibilities:', "Corel products enable millions of connected knowledge workers around the world to do great work faster. Offering some of the industry's best-known software brands, we give individuals and teams the power to create, collaborate, and deliver impressive results. Our success is driven by an unwavering commitment to deliver a broad portfolio of innovative applications – including CorelDRAW®, MindManager®, Parallels®, and WinZip® – to inspire users and help them achieve their goals.", 'Build data models, ETLs and data wrangling workflows for various projects.', 'Perform exploratory data analysis on various data sets available within the corporation. Eventually be the expert on key data sets within Corel.', 'Corel is all about breaking convention to achieve exceptional things. We’re the people behind the world’s leading software and we’re obsessed with finding new ways to harness the creativity of our customers and our employees. We’re a talented, eclectic, and eccentric group that makes coming to work every day worth your while. This is not your typical tech team. We also have a healthy respect for work-life balance – so you can leave work at work.', 'The mission of the Corel Analytics team is to leverage data to find insights that empower the Executive Leadership Team to make smart decisions and to optimize eCommerce and Channel sales operations across the 25+ brands under Corel Corporation. ', 'Qualifications:', 'Bachelors or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineer, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or in an similar quantitative field is preferred. ', 'Self-starter with a can-do attitude and a strong sense of ownership.', 'Optimize and maintain our distributed data infrastructure that includes warehouses like Google Big Query, AWS Redshift and SQL Servers.', 'Fast learner and ability to work effectively in teams.', 'Perform root cause analysis of data issues. ['', 'Entrepreneurial spirit; you enjoy diving into new requests and working out the problems.', 'The role:', 'Actively recommend and implement software improvements to data collection and research teams.', 'Previous experience working with wearables', 'Pison is creating the next generation of neural interfaces that focus on gesture recognition and neurophysiological insights. Pison leverages our patented electroneurography (ENG) platform to translate data generated from our body’s natural physiological electricity stemming at the brain into machine interpretable events in software. This allows for never before seen intuitive control of any experience in the IoT universe and discovery of neurological correlations drawn from our proprietary AI and data sets. Pison’s government, Department of Defense and Fortune 100 customers have a deep pipeline of pending projects fueling our growth. ['', 'What we’re looking for:', 'Our Benefits: Snap Inc. is its own community, so we’ve got your back! We do our best to make sure you and your loved ones have everything you need to be happy and healthy, on your own terms. You will also have exposure to full stack automation infrastructure.', 'Experience with Android/iOS automation tools and framework is a plus', 'At Snap, we believe that having a team of diverse backgrounds and voices working together will enable us to create innovative products that improve the way people live and communicate. EOE, including disability/vets. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please don’t be shy and contact us at accommodations-ext@snap.com.', 'Some core features we build and maintain include Snapchat’s Camera, Creative Tools, Maps, Chat, Memories, Stories, Discover, Games, and Minis. Our Infrastructure teams deliver an innovative and cost-efficient platform that ensures Snapchat is the fastest way to communicate with your friends, no matter where you are in the world. We have one of the fastest growing digital ad platforms, and our Monetization teams drive measurable returns for advertisers through novel ad formats like Augmented Reality. job_title: Senior Data Engineer (ETL, SQL Database, Stored Procedures)
job_text: ['Provide data profiling and work along with the senior data engineer (and other team members/architects) to correctly model and follow approved standards Unit test new code and add to our automated regression test library. ', 'Zip Code:', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Work Authorization:', 'Minimum years of IT industry experience: 10 years ', 'Please send your resume in word format, following details to anand.yalla@infolob.com , or call me @ 972-845-7069', 'Expected Billing Rate:', 'Description:', 'Develop SQL, stored procedures and ETL to enhance the current database structures to use the new platform sources based on prioritized sprint stories. ', 'LinkedIn Profile:', '\xa0', 'This position will be responsible for solutions leveraging our current SQL-Server particularly for a transformation project as we move from one servicing platform to another. ', 'Bachelor’s degree or equivalent degree in Business- CIS, Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related discipline', 'Contact Details:', 'Name in Full:', '*** Need Local Resource ***', 'Skype ID:', '8+ \xa0years writing SQL in a SQL-Server environment ', 'Position: Senior Data Engineer (ETL, SQL Database, Stored Procedures)', 'Location: Coppell, TX ', 'Take direction from a Sr. Data Engineer. ', 'Email ID:', 'Availability:', 'Job Description: POSITION SUMMARY', 'Current Location:', 'Employer Details if Any:', 'Provide unit testing and support QA and UAT testing Support downstream impacted teams in their development/testing as needed. ', 'Relocation:', 'The Data Solutions Engineer will work face-to-face with business stakeholders, and other team and IT members to create data solutions, build data models, write stored procedures, other ETL for moving data between platforms and implement data quality and other data governance processes. ', 'Experience with SQL-Server database and ETL concepts. ', 'Rate: $Open/Hour ', 'REQUIREMENTS', 'Duration: 6 Months']

problemsEvaluate different options proactively and ability to solve problems in an innovative way.Develop new solutions or combine existing methods to create new approaches', 'Good understanding of analytics', 'Explain complex topics tailored to the audience’s level of technical understanding', 'The Data Scientist you will work in collaboration with our business and IT people to create insight from data.The work will require solving complex problems by turning vast amounts of data into business insights through data exploration, data modeling, and advanced analytics including machine learning and AI.The candidate should have a strong foundation in analytics, mathematical modeling, computer science, and math - coupled with a strong business sense.They will proactively ingest information from various sources and analyze it to create a better understanding about how the business is performing. Furthermore, the Data Scientist models and builds AI tools that automate certain processes within the organization. The solutions produced will be implemented to execute upon the organization’s mission statement.', 'They will proactively ingest information from various sources and analyze it to create a better understanding about how the business is performing. Furthermore, the Data Scientist models and builds AI tools that automate certain processes within the organization. The solutions produced will be implemented to execute upon the organization’s mission statement.', 'Establish priorities with clear goals and responsibilities to achieve a high level of performance.', 'Develop an understanding of business objectives and obstacles, create solutions based on advanced analytics, and draw implications for model development.', 'Understanding of business requirements and generate insights', 'Ability to validate and follow up on results', 'Identify and interpret trends and patterns in complex data sets to enable the business to take data-driven decisions.', 'The work will require solving complex problems by turning vast amounts of data into business insights through data exploration, data modeling, and advanced analytics including machine learning and AI.', 'Help non-technical staff understand technical answers/solutions.', 'Strong communication skills, orally and in writing', 'Combine, explore, and draw insights from data, often from large and complex data assets from different parts of the organization.', 'The candidate should have a strong foundation in analytics, mathematical modeling, computer science, and math - coupled with a strong business sense.', 'Develop an understanding of business objectives and obstacles, create solutions based on advanced analytics, and draw implications for model development.Combine, explore, and draw insights from data, often from large and complex data assets from different parts of the organization.Identify and interpret trends and patterns in complex data sets to enable the business to take data-driven decisions.Design and build descriptive, predictive, or prescriptive models, utilizing optimization, simulation, and machine learning techniques.Prototype and pilot new solutions and help ‘productize’ those valuable solutions that can have impact across the organizationGuide and coach other colleagues to help solve data/technical problems at an operational level, and in methodologies to help improve development processes.Help non-technical staff understand technical answers/solutions.']

['Responsibilities:', '3+ years windows server engineering, as well as Active Directory, Exchange, VMware', 'We are working with an MSP that has a diverse spectrum of clients that are looking for a strong customer facing systems engineer to work closely with their client base. ['Must have experience with virtualization and containerization (e.g., VMware, Virtual Box)', 'AS/BS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a similar fieldProven working experience in the above fields including installing, configuring and troubleshooting UNIX /Linux based environmentsMust have experience with virtualization and containerization (e.g., VMware, Virtual Box)', 'Requirements', 'ConcertAI is in search for a Systems Engineer I that is able to design, develop, implement, maintain, and enhance our networks, systems, and equipment. Analyzes existing networks and equipment and identifies opportunities for improvement. The ideal candidate will perform a variety of tasks including help desk support, after business hours on-call support and responding to system outages, in-house application support, and more. In addition, responsible for configuring, optimizing, fine tuning, monitoring, and maintaining operating systems software, servers, and network infrastructure.Responsibilities', 'AS/BS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a similar field', 'Proven working experience in the above fields including installing, configuring and troubleshooting UNIX /Linux based environments', 'ConcertAI is the leading provider of precision oncology solutions for biopharma and healthcare, leveraging the largest collection of research-grade Real-world Data and the only broadly deployed oncology-specific AI solutions. Our mission is to improve translational sciences; accelerate therapeutic clinical development; and provide new capabilities for post-approval studies to accelerate needed new medical innovations to patients and to improve patient outcomes.\xa0', 'ConcertAI has emerged as one of the highest growth technology companies in Real-world Data and AI, backed by industry leading private equity companies: SymphonyAI, Declaration Partners, Maverick Ventures, and Alliance|Bernstein.', 'Role Summary', '\xa0', 'About ConcertAI', 'Responsibilities', 'Must have experience installing, configuring, testing and maintaining operating systems, application software and system management tools', 'Must have the ability to manage and monitor all installed systems and infrastructure', 'Must be able to provide desktop, phone, printer, and mobile computing support', 'Experience providing engineering level support for enterprise systems technologies including: LAN/WAN, switches, routers, wireless networks, firewalls, etc.', 'Learn More About ConcertAI\xa0', 'Ability to see potential issues and proactively ensure the highest levels of systems and infrastructure accessibility', 'Must be able to provide desktop, phone, printer, and mobile computing supportMust have the ability to manage and monitor all installed systems and infrastructureMust have experience installing, configuring, testing and maintaining operating systems, application software and system management toolsExperience providing engineering level support for enterprise systems technologies including: LAN/WAN, switches, routers, wireless networks, firewalls, etc.Ability to see potential issues and proactively ensure the highest levels of systems and infrastructure accessibility']

job_title: Data Scientist/Machine Learning Engineer - Top Secret Clearance
job_text: ['', ' Lead developer of distributed machine learning for applications which seek to detectemerging threats, forecast behaviors, and optimize related courses of action. T', ' Disseminating broad knowledge of analytics tools, applications and techniques. Develop applications which analyze data using descriptive, exploratory, predictive,explanatory, and prescriptive methods via automation using the latest machine learning, business intelligence, search, and intelligent data technologies.', 'Requirements', ' Create and modify applications using Java, distributed processing, and web technologies as part of a broader development team.', ' Leverage cloud services to feed multiple data sources into machine learning engines; coordinate the creation, validation, and use of models; integrate predictive results into application workflows; and support the interactions of userexperiences to meet customer requirements.', ' Lead developer of distributed machine learning for applications which seek to detectemerging threats, forecast behaviors, and optimize related courses of action. T Leverage cloud services to feed multiple data sources into machine learning engines; coordinate the creation, validation, and use of models; integrate predictive results into application workflows; and support the interactions of userexperiences to meet customer requirements. The developer will work within a broadersystem leveraging multiple distributed processing technologies like Spark, Knime, ElasticSearch, and Amazon Web Services. The developer will need to collaborate with data scientists, data integrators, application developers, and clients in driving innovation,communicating plans/possibilities, and overseeing delivery tasks on small agile teams. Disseminating broad knowledge of analytics tools, applications and techniques. Develop applications which analyze data using descriptive, exploratory, predictive,explanatory, and prescriptive methods via automation using the latest machine learning, business intelligence, search, and intelligent data technologies. Create and modify applications using Java, distributed processing, and web technologies as part of a broader development team. Research, design, develop, analyze, and modify Cloud-based enterprise-wide systems and applications software.', ' BS degree in CS, Statistics, Mathematics, Physics, Engineering, or similar appliedquantitative discipline', ' The developer will work within a broadersystem leveraging multiple distributed processing technologies like Spark, Knime, ElasticSearch, and Amazon Web Services. The developer will need to collaborate with data scientists, data integrators, application developers, and clients in driving innovation,communicating plans/possibilities, and overseeing delivery tasks on small agile teams.', 'Responsibiliies', ' Research, design, develop, analyze, and modify Cloud-based enterprise-wide systems and applications software.']

['', 'DB Engineer:• Great understanding of Oracle 12c in the RAC environment.• Creating complex database objects like Stored Procedures, Functions, Packages, Triggers and Cursors.• Great knowledge of Oracle performance related features such as Query Optimizer, Execution Plans and Indexes.• Experience with Performance Tuning for Oracle RDBMS, Explain Plan and HINTS.• Partitioning large tables and creating local and global indexes for improving performance.• Maintaining users, roles and privileges for database objects.• Great understanding of how SQLLDR works and loading data from flat files using SQLLDR.• Creating Shell Scripts for invoking SQL scripts to refresh data from remote databases using DBlink and scheduled them using Crontab.• Understanding the use of Materialized views and able to disable/enable the materialized views on need basis.• Determine long running queries in the system and analyze the root cause of the issue.• Determine table locks and kill the process which are causing blocking sessions.• Identity the cause for the locks and working with the development team to fix.• Expertise in Dynamic SQL, Collections and exceptional handling.']

['', 'Experience in the Spring Framework is a plus', 'Design and build machine learning systems that process data sets from the world’s largest consumer services', 'Use big data technologies (e.g. Spark, Hadoop, HBase, Cassandra) to build large scale machine learning pipelines', 'Develop new systems on top of realtime streaming technologies (e.g. Kafka, Flink)', 'Summary:', 'Requirements', 'DataVisor is a next generation security company that utilizes industry leading unsupervised machine learning to detect fraudulent activity for financial transactions, mobile user acquisition, social networks, commerce and money laundering. Our solution is used by some of the largest internet properties in the world, including Pinterest, AirAsia, Synchrony Financial, Tokopedia, letgo, Zomato and Ping An, to protect them from the ever-increasing risk of fraud.', 'Use unsupervised machine learning, supervised machine learning, and deep learning to detect fraudulent behavior and catch fraudsters', 'Proven working experience in Java or C++ development', 'Experience with test-driven development is a plus', 'As complex fraud attacks become more prevalent, it is more important than ever to detect fraudsters in real-time. The platform team is responsible for developing the architecture that makes real-time UML possible. We are looking for creative and eager engineers to help us expand our novel streaming and database systems, which enable our detection capabilities.', "We continue to push the boundary of what's possible in fraud detection and data processing at scale. Join us to help usher in more innovative solutions to the fraud detection space.", 'Help design/build distributed real-time systems and features', 'As platform engineers, we are building a next-generation machine learning platform, which incorporates our secret sauce, UML (unsupervised machine learning) with other SML (supervised machine learning) algorithms. Our team works to improve our core detection algorithms and automate the full training process.', 'Excellent knowledge of Relational Databases, SQL and ORM technologies (JPA2, Hibernate) is a plus', 'Experience in Cassandra, HBase, Flink, Spark or Kafka is a plus.', 'BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject', 'DataVisor holds a rich product portfolio of AI as a platform and other SaaS products, such as feature platform, dEdge, rule engine, case management and dCube. Our award-winning software is powered by a team of world-class experts in big data, security, and scalable infrastructure. Our culture is open, positive, collaborative, and results driven. Come join us!', 'Benefits', "What you'll do", 'Build and optimize systems, tools, and validation strategies to support new features', 'We offer a flexible schedule with competitive pay, equity participation and health benefits, along with catered lunch, company off-sites, and game nights, as well as the opportunity to work with a world class team.', 'Design and build machine learning systems that process data sets from the world’s largest consumer servicesUse unsupervised machine learning, supervised machine learning, and deep learning to detect fraudulent behavior and catch fraudstersBuild and optimize systems, tools, and validation strategies to support new featuresHelp design/build distributed real-time systems and featuresUse big data technologies (e.g. Spark, Hadoop, HBase, Cassandra) to build large scale machine learning pipelinesDevelop new systems on top of realtime streaming technologies (e.g. Kafka, Flink)', 'BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subjectProven working experience in Java or C++ developmentExcellent knowledge of Relational Databases, SQL and ORM technologies (JPA2, Hibernate) is a plusExperience in Cassandra, HBase, Flink, Spark or Kafka is a plus.Experience in the Spring Framework is a plusExperience with test-driven development is a plus']

job_title: 1st Python Software Engineer in the US - Series B ($100m+) – Business Workflow Automation Platform Start-Up
job_text: ['', 'Working as the first PS python software engineer in the US you will focus on customer satisfaction and support.', 'Be the key point of contact and assist customers with python coding to ensure their customer applications are able to run/perform successfully.', 'Experience with data wrangling/Machine Learning/Natural Language Processing', 'Currently either in a Software Engineering or Professional Services role.', 'Working closely with the VP to shape and add process into the PS function with a roadmap into leadership.\xa0', 'This company will become a household name within the next few years and now is definitely the time to get onboard. GET IN TOUCH for more information!', "This person will be central to understanding customers' pain points and designing end-to-end solutions to address these. They will also be a pivotal member of the tech team who will hugely influence future iterations of the solution as it develops within the market.", "Orama are proud to be exclusively partnered with a Start-Up who are changing how enterprise businesses can use the latest advances in NLP/AI to automate their critical application workflows. With huge attention from leading VC's which has led to $100m+ of funding in less than 5 years and a significant number of enterprise customers, they are now looking to build their professional services team out in the USA - starting with a python software engineer.", '\xa0', 'MUST have 3-5 years experience in hands-on Python development.Currently either in a Software Engineering or Professional Services role.Experience with data wrangling/Machine Learning/Natural Language ProcessingHave strong communication skills and the ability to explain complex technologies.Have a start-up mentality - this is exciting but challenging in equal measure.Based in San Francisco.', '\xa0\xa0', '1st Python Software Engineer - Series B ($100m+) – Business Workflow Automation Platform Start-Up\xa0', 'Based in San Francisco.', 'In order to apply for this role you will have the following experience:', 'Solutions Architecture - coming up with a specific solution plan and design.', 'Have strong communication skills and the ability to explain complex technologies.', 'Have a start-up mentality - this is exciting but challenging in equal measure.', 'Salary $200-250k OTE + STOCK', 'Design and manage the implementation and adoption plan for the customer.', 'Working as the first PS python software engineer in the US you will focus on customer satisfaction and support.Solutions Architecture - coming up with a specific solution plan and design.Design and manage the implementation and adoption plan for the customer.Be the key point of contact and assist customers with python coding to ensure their customer applications are able to run/perform successfully.Working closely with the VP to shape and add process into the PS function with a roadmap into leadership.\xa0', 'MUST have 3-5 years experience in hands-on Python development.']

['', 'Responsibilities:', 'Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability', 'Ph.D. or published research in machine learningActive participation in ML meetups / professional groupsContributions to OSS / Github profileExperience with OCR engines', 'Be flexible, a self-starter, and a fast-learner', 'Job Location: ', 'Contributions to OSS / Github profile', 'Being a strong problem-solver with good communication and collaboration skills', 'Significant experience with Python or Java', 'Experience with OCR engines', 'Give and receive constructive code reviews', 'Job Description:', 'Experience with computer vision and natural language processing in production environments.', 'Build elegant solutions to challenges associated with analyzing financial documents', 'Active participation in ML meetups / professional groups', 'Improve our verification platform and use machine learning and other techniques to automate and intelligently default crowd/user tasks', 'Extra Credit:', 'Job Location: New York\xa0', 'Build elegant solutions to challenges associated with analyzing financial documentsImprove our verification platform and use machine learning and other techniques to automate and intelligently default crowd/user tasksDeploy new features on our core product and iterate on improvementsGive and receive constructive code reviewsBeing a strong problem-solver with good communication and collaboration skillsOptimize applications for maximum speed and scalabilityBe flexible, a self-starter, and a fast-learner', 'Ph.D. or published research in machine learning', 'Deploy new features on our core product and iterate on improvements', 'We are a fintech infrastructure company that transforms documents into actionable data with over 99% accuracy. Powered by Artificial Intelligence and a unique, human-in-the-loop data validation process, We plugs directly into customer workflows via API, eliminating the need for manual data work. The solution includes built-in fraud detection and analytics, enabling customers to make smarter and faster business decisions with unprecedented precision.', 'Requirements:', 'Masters degree in Computer Science or Electrical Engineering with a focus on Machine Learning and at least 3 years of related experienceStrong background in deploying machine learning models in large-scale production environments. Evidenced by relevant experience in one or more MLops specific areas: scalable systems (e.g. Spark, Hadoop), active learning/ self-learning systems.Experience with computer vision and natural language processing in production environments.Significant experience with Python or Java', 'Masters degree in Computer Science or Electrical Engineering with a focus on Machine Learning and at least 3 years of related experience', 'Strong background in deploying machine learning models in large-scale production environments. Evidenced by relevant experience in one or more MLops specific areas: scalable systems (e.g. Spark, Hadoop), active learning/ self-learning systems.', 'We’re looking for a senior ML and AI Engineer who is an expert with backend technologies but can operate at full-stack capacity if needed. We need someone with a strong and successful track record of solving hard problems using out-of-the-box thinking.\xa0']

['', 'Please Review The Following Job Description', ' As a Decision Scientist, focus on high impact, visible analyses and initiatives across multiple business models, covering banking channels, segments, and products, including but not limited to: Deposits, Operations, Small Business, Virtual Banking, Client Experience, Call Center, and Premier Banking.', ' Bachelor’s degree or equivalent education and 2+ years of experience in Banking, Finance, Decision/Data Science, Analytics, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics or Engineering.', ' Exercise sound judgment, risk management, and foster a client centric culture throughout design, development, and deployment practices.', ' Pursue business outcomes valued through increased revenue and/or efficiency leveraging data-driven insights powered by analytics in support of enhanced decision-making. Focus on continuous improvement in decision science delivery and outcomes in pursuit of business optimization.', ' Master’s in a quantitative field such as Finance, Mathematics, Analytics, Data Science, Computer Science, or Engineering. 4+ years of experience in Banking, Finance, Decision/Data Science, Analytics, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics or Engineering. 2+ years of decision science/analytics project management experience with a diverse project focus and demonstrated results.', ' Master’s in a quantitative field such as Finance, Mathematics, Analytics, Data Science, Computer Science, or Engineering.', '. This email inbox is monitored for reasonable accommodation requests only. Any other correspondence will not receive a response.', ' Experience in delivering insights against tight deadlines in a collaborative environment to drive maximum impact.', 'Regular Or Temporary', ' As a Decision Scientist, focus on high impact, visible analyses and initiatives across multiple business models, covering banking channels, segments, and products, including but not limited to: Deposits, Operations, Small Business, Virtual Banking, Client Experience, Call Center, and Premier Banking. Partner on target initiatives as assigned; work independently and with internal teammates to drive decision science projects leveraging quantitative analysis techniques, including machine learning, in pursuit of business optimization and impact. Pursue business outcomes valued through increased revenue and/or efficiency leveraging data-driven insights powered by analytics in support of enhanced decision-making. Focus on continuous improvement in decision science delivery and outcomes in pursuit of business optimization. Explore and apply tools to solve business challenges and deliver solutions that are timely, accurate, and repeatable. Exercise sound judgment, risk management, and foster a client centric culture throughout design, development, and deployment practices. Foster communication and partnership across multiple levels of the organization including engagement with LOB contributors and junior-level managers.', 'Thank you for your interest in Truist! BB&T and SunTrust have come together in a transformational merger of equals to create Truist, the premier financial organization in the country. You may notice references to our legacy company names, BB&T and SunTrust, in places throughout this site. All such references should be understood to refer to Truist moving forward while we continue to transition to the Truist name.', ' Partner on target initiatives as assigned; work independently and with internal teammates to drive decision science projects leveraging quantitative analysis techniques, including machine learning, in pursuit of business optimization and impact.', 'Truist supports a diverse workforce and is an Equal Opportunity Employer who does not discriminate against individuals on the basis of race, gender, color, religion, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, veteran status or other classification protected by law. Drug Free Workplace.', 'Required Qualifications', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Explore and apply tools to solve business challenges and deliver solutions that are timely, accurate, and repeatable.', ' Foster communication and partnership across multiple levels of the organization including engagement with LOB contributors and junior-level managers.', 'Job Description', ' Incumbent should have an understanding of various database environments (IBM DB2, Oracle), technical programming skills (SAS, SQL, Toad), exposure to applied data science tools (R, Python, SAS E-Miner), familiarity with data visualization and BI tools (Tableau, MicroStrategy), and demonstrated proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, PowerPoint, Word).', ' 2+ years of decision science/analytics project management experience with a diverse project focus and demonstrated results.', ' Bachelor’s degree or equivalent education and 2+ years of experience in Banking, Finance, Decision/Data Science, Analytics, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics or Engineering. Must be able to perform in a cross-functional and collaborative team environment focused on supporting business partners with enhanced insights. 3. Innovative and strategic thinker with ability to connect to practical application, providing recommendations on target initiatives, with a strong bias to action and focus on quantifiable business impact. Experience in delivering insights against tight deadlines in a collaborative environment to drive maximum impact. Ability to maintain a high level of competency in statistical and analytical principles, tools, and techniques. Incumbent should have an understanding of various database environments (IBM DB2, Oracle), technical programming skills (SAS, SQL, Toad), exposure to applied data science tools (R, Python, SAS E-Miner), familiarity with data visualization and BI tools (Tableau, MicroStrategy), and demonstrated proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, PowerPoint, Word).', ' 4+ years of experience in Banking, Finance, Decision/Data Science, Analytics, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics or Engineering.', 'Should you have a disability and need assistance with the application process, please request a reasonable accommodation by emailing ', ' Ability to maintain a high level of competency in statistical and analytical principles, tools, and techniques.', ' or by calling 877-891-2510', 'Language Fluency: ', 'Work Shift', ' Must be able to perform in a cross-functional and collaborative team environment focused on supporting business partners with enhanced insights. 3. Bringing the proper connections together for the perfect fit.\xa0', 'Medical, Dental, PTO, Holiday tailored to meet your needs. 401K/Match, $15,000 Life Insurance, Award-Winning Employee Care Program. Established and highly regarded reputation with Green Card and H1 processing.', 'Software Engineer Anchor position on the Enterprise Connectivity EV Charging Services team. The Software Engineer Anchor role will work on a Balanced Team and collaborate with a Product Owner, Product Manager, and Product Designer to deliver projects and features to support current and future Connected Vehicle programs. Software Engineer will be responsible for working in the full technology stack and guiding fellow engineers. job_text: ['', 'Establish and test disaster recovery policies and procedures', '5 years of Site Reliability experience (SRE)', 'Strong coding experience in Ruby, Python or similar languages', 'Strong sense of ownership, ability to work independently and proven track record of driving products and changes', 'Proven experience to automate routine repeatable tasks', 'Strong experience in production support and operations', 'Strong automation, problem-solving skills, and ability to follow through to completion', '2 years with Kubernetes experience', 'Ability to wear multiple hats and multitask effectively in a fast paced environment', 'BA in Computer Science or Information Systems or combination of education and related work experience', 'Well established, rapidly growing, financial technology company bringing efficiency, connectivity, and access to credit trading through innovative technology and product design is seeking a Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) with strong Kubernetes experience. The ideal candidate will be passionate about mentoring other team members and departments on the adoption of new technologies and design principles, as well as promoting DevOps culture and collaboration. ['', 'Required skills:', 'Mansfield, MA\xa0', '1+ years as a System Integrator ', '3+ years working with drawing tools (AutoCAD, SolidWorks)', 'Benefits:\xa0', 'Knowledge of Industrial Protocols (Modbus, Ethernet IP, OPCUA, MQTT, HART)', '5+ years working with Industrial equipment5+ years in panel design3+ years working with drawing tools (AutoCAD, SolidWorks)2+ years working with Industrial Control SystemsExperience working with high/low voltage and electrical protection devicesExperience reviewing and analyzing wire diagrams, loop drawings and PIDsExperience interacting with professional customers and coworkersStrong oral and written communication skills', 'Bedrock Automation has developed the world’s most powerful and cyber secure automation platform. EST', '• Extend and enhance the business Data Lake', '• Be open and willing to learn new skills!', '• Design and execute strategies for real-time data analysis and decisioning.', '• Experience with AWS technologies such as Aurora, Athena, EMR, Redshift, S3', '• with data manipulation scripting languages', 'Experience', '• Excellent Organizational and Project Management skills', 'Responsibilities/Job Duties/Job Description/Qualifications:', '• Collaborate with key stake holders and translate business requirements to technical requirements and implement solutions under the guidance of technical leads.', '• with Business Intelligence, MDM, XML, SOA/WebServices', 'Duration: 12 months', '• with data integration tools (e.g., Talend (preferred), Cascading)', '• Design and Develop scalable Big Data Warehouse solutions across the entire data supply chain.', '• with Data Science toolsets and technology', '• Familiarity with Linux', '• Familiarity with Jenkins and CI/CD', '• Dive into large, noisy, and complex real-world customer TV and Digital Ad viewing data to do pre-campaign planning and post campaigns performance measurement using Big data Platform (DataBricks, Pyspark, Glue, EMR).']

job_title: Machine Learning Software Engineer - Data Analytics
job_text: ['', 'Desired Relevant Experience', 'A Bachelor’s degree or higher in Software Engineering, Aerospace Engineering, or related field.', 'Experience with ATM (Air Traffic Management) desirable.', '3-7 years of software experience.', 'Work with a team of highly motivated software developers and aviation researchers that is central to the research undertaken by NASA’s Aviation Systems Division and NARI (National Aeronautics Research Institute). ', 'Building Natural Language Processing Toolchains.', 'Extensive experience with software prototyping or designing experimental software.', 'Must be a US Citizen or Green Card Holder.', 'Work with a team of highly motivated software developers and aviation researchers that is central to the research undertaken by NASA’s Aviation Systems Division and NARI (National Aeronautics Research Institute).  Construct toolchains for extraction of meaningful data from paper documents, and use these toolchains to identify and pursue research questions. Participate in data analysis, system modeling and initial review of appropriate software architecture working with project architect and other team members. Develop data analytics pipeline and customize AI/ML/NLP (natural language processing) algorithms for achieving end results. Configure and customize off-the-shelf algorithms/libraries to be used in project prototypes, deployed in cloud sandbox environments. Responsible for developing integration, custom software modules, and relevant documentation for project-specific deliverables. ', 'Configure and customize off-the-shelf algorithms/libraries to be used in project prototypes, deployed in cloud sandbox environments.', 'As a Machine Learning Software Engineer, You Will', 'Work with a team of highly motivated software developers and aviation researchers that is central to the research undertaken by NASA’s Aviation Systems Division and NARI (National Aeronautics Research Institute). Work with a team of driven, supportive and highly skilled professionals. Receive a robust benefits package that includes Employee Stock Ownership Plan! Enjoy flexibility managing your work hours and personal needs with a single accrual leave plan. ', 'Work with a team of highly motivated software developers and aviation researchers that is central to the research undertaken by NASA’s Aviation Systems Division and NARI (National Aeronautics Research Institute).', 'Receive a robust benefits package that includes Employee Stock Ownership Plan!', 'Participate in data analysis, system modeling and initial review of appropriate software architecture working with project architect and other team members.', 'Enjoy flexibility managing your work hours and personal needs with a single accrual leave plan.', 'Comfortable working in a cloud development environment (Amazon Web Services or Microsoft Azure).', 'Analytical and problem-solving skills for design, creation and testing of custom software.', 'Work with a team of driven, supportive and highly skilled professionals.', 'Document analysis and automated data extraction.', 'Document analysis and automated data extraction. Building ML toolchains. Experience with ATM (Air Traffic Management) desirable. Building Natural Language Processing Toolchains. Software Prototyping and Sandbox Development. Open-ended data analytics and research. Piloting, air-traffic management, ATC procedures, flight planning and airspace operations.', 'Open-ended data analytics and research.', 'Building ML toolchains.', 'Job Description', 'Develop data analytics pipeline and customize AI/ML/NLP (natural language processing) algorithms for achieving end results.', 'Construct toolchains for extraction of meaningful data from paper documents, and use these toolchains to identify and pursue research questions.', 'Experience in software design practices working with big data, SQL, or no-SQL (Hadoop, Spark) technologies.', 'A willingness to learn and remain agile in a dynamic environment.', 'Experience with machine learning techniques, tools, and frameworks.', 'Proficiency in one or more of: Python, Java, and C++', 'Software Prototyping and Sandbox Development.', 'A Bachelor’s degree or higher in Software Engineering, Aerospace Engineering, or related field. 3-7 years of software experience. Proficiency in one or more of: Python, Java, and C++ Experience in software design practices working with big data, SQL, or no-SQL (Hadoop, Spark) technologies. Experience with machine learning techniques, tools, and frameworks. Comfortable working in a cloud development environment (Amazon Web Services or Microsoft Azure). A willingness to learn and remain agile in a dynamic environment. Analytical and problem-solving skills for design, creation and testing of custom software. Extensive experience with software prototyping or designing experimental software. Must be a US Citizen or Green Card Holder. ', 'Piloting, air-traffic management, ATC procedures, flight planning and airspace operations.', 'Machine Learning Software Enginee', 'Responsible for developing integration, custom software modules, and relevant documentation for project-specific deliverables.', 'Machine Learning Software Engineer:']

We provide the information they need to optimise athletes’ health, game-day readiness, and performance, as well as in-game tactics.\xa0Our solutions include wearable technology, video analytics, and athlete monitoring solutions, and we are passionate about helping sports organizations at all levels to better scout, recruit, teach, and win.\xa0\xa0\xa0', "10+ years experience working with relational databases (MS SQL Server preferred)5+ years software development experience (C#, c++, or Java preferred)Experience replicating databases across LAN/WAN networksExperience administering, performance tuning, and supporting SQL databasesStrong object-oriented design skillsExperience delivering Cloud-based productsUnderstanding of test-driven development and continuous integrationUnderstanding of agile software development methodologiesAbility to quickly learn new technologies and productsA history of delivering and supporting customer-facing applicationsExperience developing, deploying, and consuming SOAP or REST APIs is a plusExperience administering SQL databases in Microsoft Azure is a plusExperience working with Microsoft Sync Framework SDK is a plusExperience authoring test automation scripts is a plusBachelor's degree in Computer Science (or equivalent experience)", 'We are looking for a talented and inquisitive\xa0Principal Software Engineer\xa0whose drive for learning and determination for continuous improvement aligns with our ambitious, fast-growing and transforming company. Based in Boston, you will be a key player in planning, designing, building and testing the features of our next generation cloud platform that combines digital video assets, wearable data and athlete information to provide insights and analytics to coaching/support staff, sports scientists and athletes to assist in optimizing athlete performance. We believe that our customers deserve the best platform and we are on a mission to maximise and enhance their performance through delivering a high quality experience. Our software engineers match this ethos by taking responsibility for constantly improving productivity and development of self and be able to excel in a fast-paced environment with your short project timelines from conception to deployment.', 'We value improvement and development.
