job_text: ['', ' Exposure of IT Operations Architecture', ' Should have an experience of any time-series database (Influx DB, Cortex)', ' We are looking for a Technical Lead who can design and build the data integration process for capturing and integrating logs, metrics, traces from systems and applications for a command center.', ' Good to have an experience of distributed tracing using Zipkin or Jaeger', ' Should have an experience of data processing using Kafka', ' Experience in design/implementation with distributed applications', 'Additional Technical Skills:', ' Good understanding of architecture disciplines including business, applications, infrastructure, storage, security, platforms, data, analytics, networking on-premise and in a cloud environment', 'Mandatory Technical Skills:', ' The command center will serve as an advanced decision support center with real time visibility into the entire enterprise application operations, data and infrastructure monitoring.', 'Job Requirements', ' We are looking for a Technical Lead who can design and build the data integration process for capturing and integrating logs, metrics, traces from systems and applications for a command center. The command center will serve as an advanced decision support center with real time visibility into the entire enterprise application operations, data and infrastructure monitoring. Should have an experience of any time-series database (Influx DB, Cortex) Should have an experience of data processing using Kafka Should have an experience of designing and building Java/python based custom connectors for fetching operation details from applications. Good to have an experience of distributed tracing using Zipkin or Jaeger Exposure of IT Operations Architecture Experience in design/implementation with distributed applications Good understanding of architecture disciplines including business, applications, infrastructure, storage, security, platforms, data, analytics, networking on-premise and in a cloud environment', ' Should have an experience of designing and building Java/python based custom connectors for fetching operation details from applications.']

['', "Where's the job?", 'Collaborators', 'Requirements', "  Exemplary Practitioners: Our software engineers write quality code to build features and fix bugs.  Specialization: We are looking for a mix of people with specialization across the technology stack, including front-end web, back-end web, and native mobile app experience.  Continuous Learners: We believe the best engineers are interested in learning new tools of the trades, including programming languages, development frameworks, and platforms.  Collaborators: Engineers work closely with product managers and designers to create the best products for our customers.  Experience: We are looking for engineers with a solid foundation, which you can demonstrate through a combination of formal education, self teaching, personal projects, or work experience. If you've never written code, this is not the job for you. We do not limit our search to engineers who have a computer science degree and 5+ years of experience ", " Experience: We are looking for engineers with a solid foundation, which you can demonstrate through a combination of formal education, self teaching, personal projects, or work experience. If you've never written code, this is not the job for you. We do not limit our search to engineers who have a computer science degree and 5+ years of experience", "Here's How It Works", 'A 30-minute info call with our recruiter or VP of engineering', ' Exemplary Practitioners: Our software engineers write quality code to build features and fix bugs.', 'On the front-end, we use React for our desktop and mobile web products. We use React Native to power our iOS and Android apps. A single code base cross compiles to all platforms using a custom technology we developed.', ' Continuous Learners: We believe the best engineers are interested in learning new tools of the trades, including programming languages, development frameworks, and platforms.', 'Our Technology', 'Generous PTO plan, plus 10 paid national holidays', 'Continuous Learners', ' Collaborators: Engineers work closely with product managers and designers to create the best products for our customers.', 'For video, we use WebRTC services from Twilio and Vonage.', 'A fun, collaborative environment where the company is working to define the future of telemedicine', 'Three 30-minute, back-to-back, one-on-one interviews with our engineers.', 'Exemplary Practitioners:', 'Competitive salary based on experience', '100% remote work', ' Competitive salary based on experience Great benefits package including medical, dental, vision, HSA & FSA plans 401(k) Generous PTO plan, plus 10 paid national holidays A fun, collaborative environment where the company is working to define the future of telemedicine Excellent opportunity for professional growth 100% remote work', 'Experience', 'For error reporting and monitoring, we use Airbrake and New Relic.', 'Specialization', ' Specialization: We are looking for a mix of people with specialization across the technology stack, including front-end web, back-end web, and native mobile app experience.', 'A take-home coding exercise', ' A 30-minute info call with our recruiter or VP of engineering Three 30-minute, back-to-back, one-on-one interviews with our engineers. A take-home coding exercise ', 'Benefits', 'Great benefits package including medical, dental, vision, HSA & FSA plans', 'Our Infrastructure is moving to AWS, with the back-end powered by Docker containers running in Fargate/ECS, our front-end served by CloudFront, and data stored in Aurora. We strive for a serverless architecture to minimize the operational burden on engineers.', 'And of course, there is much more!', '401(k)', 'On the back-end, we use Ruby on Rails, Go, and NodeJS.', 'Excellent opportunity for professional growth', 'Our Interview Process', ' On the front-end, we use React for our desktop and mobile web products. We use React Native to power our iOS and Android apps. A single code base cross compiles to all platforms using a custom technology we developed. On the back-end, we use Ruby on Rails, Go, and NodeJS. Our Infrastructure is moving to AWS, with the back-end powered by Docker containers running in Fargate/ECS, our front-end served by CloudFront, and data stored in Aurora. We strive for a serverless architecture to minimize the operational burden on engineers. For error reporting and monitoring, we use Airbrake and New Relic. For video, we use WebRTC services from Twilio and Vonage. And of course, there is much more! ']

['', 'A genuine enthusiasm for being part of a team and working with other people be it designers, other engineers that come in to support you, or the broader venture team.', "You enjoy delivering delightful, polished front ends. You needn't be a designer—but you enjoy working with them and appreciate the work that goes into achieving that level of front-end polish and delight.", '4+ years in a full-time engineering role', 'The Problem', 'A fit with our values, and a sense of humor.\xa0', 'This is an opportunity to help us shape our product and establish a technical foundation for a business that is looking to scale ambitiously.\xa0', 'Location Preference: ', 'Location Preference: US, UK, EU, Remote', 'Familiarity with and passion for front-end web work', 'Project Kix is a mission to make user research smarter.', 'Buttoned up and on top of the details', 'Helping us make the right technical decisions from the start', 'Our team is regarded as one of the strongest players in the space by organizations like Facebook, PayPal, and Pepsico. We are painfully aware of how much this space needs to change. We have insight into what’s wrong with the status quo, where new players are falling short, an understanding of how customers embrace new solutions, a strong UX focus, and the contacts across industries to get the right product adopted in the right places.', 'The Opportunity', "4+ years in a full-time engineering roleGrounding in CS fundamentals—you've got the broad-based knowledge needed to build a collaborative, client-server application end to end. You may need to pick up some new platforms & skills along the way but you're good at that and it's fun for you.A mix of systems thinking and scrappiness: we know we'll have to refactor stuff as we scale but we’d like to minimize that by future-proofing as much as we can up front.A genuine enthusiasm for being part of a team and working with other people be it designers, other engineers that come in to support you, or the broader venture team.A passion for productExperience building products that scaleFamiliarity with and passion for front-end web workFamiliarity with AWS and Google APIsExperience with AI & ML (Voice-to-text, Computer Vision, TensorFlow, Google Cloud Services)You enjoy delivering delightful, polished front ends. You needn't be a designer—but you enjoy working with them and appreciate the work that goes into achieving that level of front-end polish and delight.An interest in understanding our users and being involved in our conversations about product strategyA fit with our values, and a sense of humor.\xa0A greater commitment to quality outcomes than social protocol: A willingness to speak up and step on toes when necessary and an openness to having the same done to you.Buttoned up and on top of the detailsA genuine sense of curiosity when it comes to users and how they behave", 'Working closely with a tight team as we hone the product', 'Experience with AI & ML (Voice-to-text, Computer Vision, TensorFlow, Google Cloud Services)', 'We’re using AI and ML to disrupt the industry and are looking for a a full-stack, user-centric, systems thinker with a passion for awesome products. We recently validated an early version of the product with a few customers and are looking to build the team that takes this venture forward.', 'A greater commitment to quality outcomes than social protocol: A willingness to speak up and step on toes when necessary and an openness to having the same done to you.', 'A genuine sense of curiosity when it comes to users and how they behave', 'In practice that means you will be', "The research industry is a $50 Billion industry running on 90s technology. Organizations are being pushed to become more user centric, but getting to great user insights is a cumbersome process. While customers are pushing for smarter approaches to research, the industry is struggling to see beyond a service model that lacks efficiency and scalability. Some startups are popping up with solutions but most lack a real understanding around how customers really work. We're not the only ones who have spotted this opportunity, but most players lack perspective to design the right products or the technical skills to unlock the full potential of what tech has to offer. We'd like to change that.", 'The Conspirators', 'What you’ll need for this mission', 'An interest in understanding our users and being involved in our conversations about product strategy', "A mix of systems thinking and scrappiness: we know we'll have to refactor stuff as we scale but we’d like to minimize that by future-proofing as much as we can up front.", 'Setting a high bar for our engineering function going forward', 'Familiarity with AWS and Google APIs', 'Experience building products that scale', "Grounding in CS fundamentals—you've got the broad-based knowledge needed to build a collaborative, client-server application end to end. You may need to pick up some new platforms & skills along the way but you're good at that and it's fun for you.", 'Getting your hands dirty building productSetting a high bar for our engineering function going forwardHelping us make the right technical decisions from the startWorking closely with a tight team as we hone the product', 'Getting your hands dirty building product', 'A passion for product']

['', 'Software Engineer ', 'Experience with Python, Javascript and AWS or the willingness to learn :)', "You're resourceful and seek creative solutions when faced with obstaclesYou get sh*t done — results > PowerpointsYou love to learn. If you geek out over tech and design after hours, you'll fit right inYou don't take yourself too seriously — save your blazer for your cousin's weddingYou like to get your hands dirty — good leadership means rolling up your sleeves", 'NOTE: Candidates must be US citizens/Permanent Residents located in NY, CA, WA or TX or be willing to relocate', 'About This Role', "Every company is unique, and we want to make sure we're a good fit for you. Here's who we're looking for:", 'Minimum of 3+ years of industry experience, preferably with an ecommerce, SaaS/PaaS company', 'Minimum of 3+ years of industry experience, preferably with an ecommerce, SaaS/PaaS companyExperience with Python, Javascript and AWS or the willingness to learn :)Experience working in a collaborative team environmentWhile this role is remote, there is a preference for future teammates based in the Austin, TX area', 'This is a unique role best suited for someone who can fearlessly take a task and run with it, and use their broad range to work through the whole stack with confidence. Our ideal candidate has:', "That's where you, the Software Engineer, come in.", 'We recently rebuilt our platform with an updated tech stack that includes Python, Vue.js, Javascript, Node, AWS, ElasticSearch and run a CICD environment.', "On the day-to-day, you'll be:", ' Software Engineer,', "Our motto? The tools you need to run your business shouldn't put you out of business. And we're committed to bringing our community the absolute best deals on software. With thousands of successful product launches and over a million entrepreneurs served, we're looking to take AppSumo to the next level.", 'In your first three months, success means you have learned the code base and shipped out three meaningful updates to the AppSumo website.', "Up for the challenge? Let's do this :)", 'Partnering closely with customer support to respond to user issues', "At AppSumo, we treat all of our teammates like adults and trust that when you have something to do, you'll get it done. If you need to run an errand, hit the gym, or meet a friend for lunch, you're encouraged to do so. You can work from home as often as you need to, and you'll have unlimited vacation days to go on adventures. (Everyone says it, but we mean it: We expect you to take time for yourself.)", "We're committed to creating a diverse, supportive, and collaborative working environment — every person we bring onto the team helps cultivate a culture that we're proud of.", 'Who Is AppSumo', 'While this role is remote, there is a preference for future teammates based in the Austin, TX area', "You don't take yourself too seriously — save your blazer for your cousin's wedding", "This job is about collaborating to assess the biggest business opportunities exist on our site and implementing cutting-edge solutions that improve the AppSumo platform. In this role, you'll work on customer-facing products and watch your code impact millions of users within days! We work hard and ship fast, but we still keep a high bar for quality and testing.", 'Pay & Benefits', 'Working in a CI/CD environment with python, Jenkins, and touching on AWS and Docker', 'Experience working in a collaborative team environment', "In addition, we offer a stocked fridge, any snacks you want, and (once we're allowed outside again) two all-expenses paid company trips with the team to the local Sheraton — just kidding: last year, we went to an all-inclusive resort in Costa Rica; you can check it out here.", 'Working on infrastructure to handle hundreds of terabytes of user data using Postgres, ElasticSearch, Redis, and more', 'You get sh*t done — results > Powerpoints', "AppSumo is the tech powerhouse you've probably never heard of. We've helped launch MailChimp, Evernote, and Dropbox (to name a few) — over 1,500 startups have come through our doors and become household names in software. (Learn more about us here!)", 'Working with our senior engineers, product and design team to deeply understand the needs of our users', 'You like to get your hands dirty — good leadership means rolling up your sleeves', 'We provide a competitive compensation and benefits package. Due to the coronavirus, our team is remaining remote through the summer of 2021, and it is currently optional to go into our Austin office.', "When at the office, you'll be equipped with a standing desk, a monitor, and any other tech you need to feel productive. Oh, and you can bring your dog to work. We love your dog :)", 'Building software to reach millions of users, using Python and Javascript', 'Working with our senior engineers, product and design team to deeply understand the needs of our usersBuilding software to reach millions of users, using Python and JavascriptWorking on infrastructure to handle hundreds of terabytes of user data using Postgres, ElasticSearch, Redis, and moreWorking in a CI/CD environment with python, Jenkins, and touching on AWS and DockerPartnering closely with customer support to respond to user issues', 'Who Thrives At AppSumo', "You're resourceful and seek creative solutions when faced with obstacles", "You love to learn. Employees are expected to make decisions in a timely manner and display emotional intelligence during occasional stressful situations.', 'Spark, Scala, Hadoop, Python, and AWS EMRTerraform, Jenkins, Airflow, and AWS Step FunctionsJupyter and ZeppelinAWS S3, AWS Redshift, AWS ECS, AWS SQS and TeradataGSuite, Slack, Jira, Confluence, Git, and Github', 'Responsibilities', 'Three weeks of PTO', 'Minimum of 5 years relevant work experience\xa0', 'Experience in a technical leadership role', 'Build scalable data processing pipelines in SparkDebug Spark jobs and do performance tuningWrite unit and integration tests for all data processing codeWork with DevOps engineers on CI, CD, and IaCRead specs and translate them into code and design documentsPerform code reviews and develop processes for improving code qualityBecome intimately familiar with the medicare claims data model', '100% paid life insurance', 'If you are an individual with a disability and require a reasonable accommodation to complete any part of the application process, or are limited in the ability or unable to access or use this online application process and need an alternative method for applying, you may contact 703-787-9656 x257 or HR@semanticbits.com for assistance.', 'SemanticBits is a leading company specializing in the design and development of digital health services, and the work we do is just as unique as the culture we’ve created. We develop cutting-edge solutions to complex problems for commercial, academic, and government organizations. The systems we develop are used in finding cures for deadly diseases, improving the quality of healthcare delivered to millions of people, and revolutionizing the healthcare industry on a nationwide scale. There is a meaningful connection between our work and the real people who benefit from it; and, as such, we create an environment in which new ideas and innovative strategies are encouraged. We are an established company with the mindset of a startup and we feel confident that we offer an employment experience unlike any other and that we set our employees up for professional success every day.', 'Required Qualifications', 'Excellent command of written and spoken English', 'Read specs and translate them into code and design documents', 'Ten paid holiday days', 'Experience with Agile methodology, using test-driven development', '401k retirement plan with matching benefit', 'Bachelor’s degree required in Computer Science or related fieldMinimum of 5 years relevant work experience\xa0Highly Competent with Scala, Spark, the Spark Engine, and the Spark Dataframe APIExperience in a technical leadership roleExperience with Agile methodology, using test-driven developmentExcellent command of written and spoken EnglishCandidate must reside in the United StatesFlexible and willing to accept a change in priorities as necessary', 'Write unit and integration tests for all data processing code', 'You will work on projects that support the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) as we develop a next-generation analytics and reporting system that directly impacts healthcare quality. You will use Spark to build data processing pipelines that derive information from large sets of government data. You will be the go-to on your team for Spark, the Spark Engine, and the Spark Dataframe API. You will take a proactive approach in learning new technologies in distributed processing and cloud computing to pilot PoC for new development. We are a collaborative company, so we want you to use your knowledge of Spark to teach others, inform design decisions, and debug runtime problems.', 'Perform code reviews and develop processes for improving code quality', 'Jupyter and Zeppelin', 'Tools & Technology', 'Debug Spark jobs and do performance tuning', 'Flexible working hours', 'SemanticBits, LLC is an equal opportunity, affirmative action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability, or any other characteristic protected by law. We are also a veteran-friendly employer.', 'Benefits', 'Competitive salary', 'Terraform, Jenkins, Airflow, and AWS Step Functions', 'Comprehensive health benefits (medical with HSA option, dental, and vision)', 'AWS S3, AWS Redshift, AWS ECS, AWS SQS and Teradata', 'Bachelor’s degree required in Computer Science or related field', 'SemanticBits is looking for a talented Lead Senior Data Engineer who is eager to apply industry experience in computer science, software engineering, databases, and distributed/parallel processing frameworks to prepare big data for the use of data analysts and data scientists while providing guidance, and mentorship to a team of developers. In this role you will drive contract initiatives to completion in a split role as a technical lead, team architect (IaC), and policy liaison with leadership and stakeholders. You will work closely with other technical leads on cross functional teams to solve challenging data delivery problems. You will advocate for best practices and technical debt reduction to streamline processing and reduce maintenance costs / cloud footprint. If you have experience with Scala and Spark and want your work to contribute to systems that collect healthcare data used by hundreds of thousands of daily users, we want to (virtually) meet you!', 'Work with DevOps engineers on CI, CD, and IaC', 'Build scalable data processing pipelines in Spark']

job_title: Data Scientist I - School of Public Health
company: The University of Texas Health Science Center at Houston (UTHealth)
job_text: ['', 'Physical Requirements', 'Position Key Accountabilities', 'Perform as a results-oriented problem solver to quickly synthesize complex scenarios, connect abstract patterns/information, apply appropriate methods, and implement practical and timely solutions', 'Master’s degree in health care, management, mathematics, engineering, informatics, or a related field', 'Build models that incorporate diverse data sets representing administrative, clinical and social health indicators.', 'Prioritizes/handles multiple projects in a fast-paced environment while remaining on task', 'Perform other duties as assigned.', ' Proficiency with statistical packages, data bases and programming languages for data preparation, storage, transformation, analysis or visualization. Examples include R, SAS, SPSS, Matlab, SQL, Python, Hadoop, Pig, Hive, MapReduce, Java Tableau, Excel or other big data frameworks. Ability to work with a wide variety of data formats/sources such as relational databases, XML, JSON, CSV, text, sensors/activity trackers, clickstreams, social media, and geolocation Effective communication skills including written, oral, listening and interpersonal. ', 'Ability to work with a wide variety of data formats/sources such as relational databases, XML, JSON, CSV, text, sensors/activity trackers, clickstreams, social media, and geolocation', 'Position Summary', ' Supports the CHCD faculty and clinical, business and research customers with data science services on a variety of project subjects including health outcomes, quality measures, population health, the impact of social determinants of health and translational research.  Build models that incorporate diverse data sets representing administrative, clinical and social health indicators. Apply a variety of methods such as statistical analysis, data mining, predictive analytics, time series analysis, multivariate regression analysis, statistical process control and optimization solutions. Perform as a results-oriented problem solver to quickly synthesize complex scenarios, connect abstract patterns/information, apply appropriate methods, and implement practical and timely solutions Prioritizes/handles multiple projects in a fast-paced environment while remaining on task Demonstrate and embrace a collaborative approach to fully realize the talents of colleagues such as data stewards, IT staff, business analysts, business stakeholders and industry experts. Perform other duties as assigned. ', 'Minimum Education', 'Proficiency with statistical packages, data bases and programming languages for data preparation, storage, transformation, analysis or visualization. Examples include R, SAS, SPSS, Matlab, SQL, Python, Hadoop, Pig, Hive, MapReduce, Java Tableau, Excel or other big data frameworks.', 'Position Type:', ' 1 year of enterprise experience as a data scientist, informaticist, statistician, senior analyst or related role ', 'Security Sensitive', 'Supports the CHCD faculty and clinical, business and research customers with data science services on a variety of project subjects including health outcomes, quality measures, population health, the impact of social determinants of health and translational research. ', 'Effective communication skills including written, oral, listening and interpersonal.', 'Apply a variety of methods such as statistical analysis, data mining, predictive analytics, time series analysis, multivariate regression analysis, statistical process control and optimization solutions.', '1 year of enterprise experience as a data scientist, informaticist, statistician, senior analyst or related role', 'Department:', ' Master’s degree in health care, management, mathematics, engineering, informatics, or a related field ', '51.215', 'Certification/Skills', 'Demonstrate and embrace a collaborative approach to fully realize the talents of colleagues such as data stewards, IT staff, business analysts, business stakeholders and industry experts.', 'Minimum Experience']

['', "Bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering or relevant field required. 7+ years experience required.", '-3+ years of experience in Python development', '-Working within an Agile framework (ideally Scrum)', '\xa0', '-3+ years of experience in writing and deploying code in AWS', 'TECHNICAL SKILLS REQUIRED', 'This position will remote with COVID situation.', '-7+ years of experience in Java development', '-Batch or stream processing systems such as Apache Spark, Flink, Akka, Storm', '-3+ years of experience in SQL script development', 'The ideal candidate is a self-motivated, multi-tasker, and demonstrated team-player. You will be a lead developer responsible for the development of new software products and enhancements to existing products. You should excel in working with large-scale applications and frameworks and have outstanding communication and leadership skills.\xa0', '-Datastores such as DynamoDB, Athena, S3, Redis and Elasticsearch', '-Message brokers such as AWS SQS, AWS SNS, Kinesis', 'TECHNICAL SKILLS REQUIRED:', "The main function of a software engineer is to apply the principles of computer science and mathematical analysis to the design, development, testing, and evaluation of the software and systems that make computers work. A typical software engineer research, designs, develops and tests operating systems-level software, compilers, and network distribution software for medical, industrial, military, communications, aerospace, business, scientific and general computing applications. Job Responsibilities: Review and approve the modification of existing databases and database management systems. Instruct staff to write and code logical and physical database descriptions and specify identifiers of database to management system. Direct database development and approve project scope and limitations. Review project requests describing database user needs to estimate time and cost required to accomplish project. Plan, coordinate, and implement security measures to safeguard information in computer files against accidental or unauthorized damage, modification or disclosure. Approve, schedule, plan and supervise the installation and testing of new products and improvements to computer systems. Develop standards and guidelines to guide the use and acquisition of software and to protect vulnerable information. Skills: Verbal and written communication skills, problem solving skills, customer service and interpersonal skills. Strong ability to work independently and manage one’s time. Strong mentoring skills necessary to provide support and constructive performance feedback. Strong knowledge of the full software development lifecycle: from business/systems analysis, through requirements gathering and functional specification authoring, to development, testing and delivery. Strong ability to troubleshoot issues and make system changes as needed to resolve issue. Strong knowledge of computer hardware and software. Knowledge of computer development software as it relates to systems, such as SQL, Visual Basic, etc. Education/Experience: Bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering or relevant field required. 8-10 years’ experience required.", '-Cucumber as a testing tool and it’s integration into CI/CD pipelines', 'Proven experience in:']

', 'A flexible, friendly and international working environment with a collaborative atmosphere ', 'Contract type:', 'Start: ASAP (or as agreed) ', 'You are an experienced engineer who is successful working in distributed organizations as part of the technology team. ', 'In order to augment our technical team we are looking for a Software Development Engineer to join our team in the US as a remote employee, with occasional face-to-face meetings, as required. ', 'Location', 'Start', 'Benefits:', 'Our platform is a one-of-a-kind\u202fglobally\u202fdistributed information system that brings together hospitals and labs to provide data ingestion and processing, analysis and modeling, reporting and intelligence, distribution and sharing\u202fof a multitude of\u202fcomplex\u202fsources\u202fof structured and unstructured data, including genomics, imaging, and clinical data, delivered as\u202fa\u202fmulti-tenant\u202fSaaS\u202fplatform\u202fon the cloud.\u202f\u202f\u202f ', ' A flexible, friendly and international working environment with a collaborative atmosphere  An exciting company mission that brings together science and technology to directly impact the lives of patients with life threatening illness. You will develop individual reports and establish metrics instrumentation best practices within the software engineering organization. ', 'An exciting company mission that brings together science and technology to directly impact the lives of patients with life threatening illness. ', 'Some travel between various SOPHiA offices and customer sites will be required (up to 10%). ', 'Experience with scalable database design and operation. ', "3 years' experience in software engineering, with a focus on metrics system development. ", 'Would you like to join the development team of a key product within our game changing computational platform used to deliver genomic, radiomic, and clinical data analysis to over 1000 healthcare institutions and over 500,000 cancer and rare genetic disease patients worldwide? Join our growing distributed team and use your exceptional technical skills to help us deliver on our mission of democratizing Data-Driven Medicine. ', 'Requirements:', 'Experience with multiple metrics collection, analysis, and visualization systems such as Prometheus, Influx stack, Collectd, Grafana. ', ' Experience with scalable database design and operation.  Excellent interpersonal and communication skills  Knowledge of software engineering best practices (Agile, Continuous Value Delivery, CI/CD, DevOps, NoOps, PaaS, IaaS, LEAN software, Service Oriented Architecture, cloud computing)  ', 'As a Metrics Software Development Engineer, you will join our development team and will contribute to the design and development of metrics collection, analysis, and visualization within the context of our platform.  ', " University degree in Computer Science, or a similar field, or equivalent professional experience  3 years' experience in software engineering, with a focus on metrics system development.  Experience with multiple metrics collection, analysis, and visualization systems such as Prometheus, Influx stack, Collectd, Grafana.  Experience within the Java, C++, and Python ecosystems.  "]

With training combined with your education and experience, you will be able to perform the following responsibilities.', 'Some experience in a role that includes information collection, data analysis, and/or experimentation', 'Ensure product features function well', 'As a QA Engineer, you will perform detailed experiments using CMT software and hardware to help the Mobile Sensing team understand how the DriveWell SDK behaves under a variety of real-world conditions. When a test fails, you will do the first pass on the investigation into the root cause of the failure (e.g., reviewing logs, determining how to reproduce the failure).As part of a small team, your contributions will be important and visible, and you will gain significant exposure to exciting new developments in mobile sensing, IoT firmware, and large-scale analytics / machine learning.', 'Write and review test plans for drive-related experiments with Android and iOS smartphones', 'Identify, record, document, and track bugs', 'Ability and interest to perform mobile software and hardware testing that requires driving', 'Responsibilities', 'Familiarity with Unix/Linux, especially using command-line toolsProficiency with SQLFamiliarity with SageMaker and Jupyter notebooksSome experience in a role that includes information collection, data analysis, and/or experimentation', 'Investigate unexpected test results or behavior by reviewing logs, running analysis scripts, querying databases, etc.', 'Willing and able to work in Cambridge, MA', 'Nice to Have', "Cambridge Mobile Telematics' (CMT) mission is to make the world’s roads and drivers safer. Since its first product launch in 2012 that pioneered mobile usage-based insurance, CMT has become the world’s leading telematics and analytics provider for insurers, rideshares, and fleets. CMT’s DriveWell platform uses mobile sensing and behavioral science to measure driving risk and incentivize safer driving, while its Claims Studio reduces the claims cycle time with real-time crash detection, crash reconstruction, and damage assessment using telematics and artificial intelligence. CMT has over 50 active programs with insurers and other partners, improving safety for millions of drivers every day around the world. Started based on research at MIT and backed by the SoftBank Vision Fund to fuel its rapid growth, CMT is headquartered in Cambridge MA. ['', 'Medical InsuranceVision InsuranceDental InsuranceUnlimited Vacation Policy', '4+ years experience implementing machine learning algorithms in a production setting.', 'Experience with cloud computing frameworks such as AWS and S3.', 'Good understanding of asynchronous control flow, with notions of concurrency and memory management', 'Rapid’s solution is already deployed with customers, and is proven to deliver increased profits and decreased costs, making our solution indispensable for the future of manufacturing.', 'Medical Insurance', 'Requirements', 'Vision Insurance', 'Successful collaborations with both ML researchers and application developers.', 'Familiarity with interfacing with cameras and design elements of vision systems.', 'Expert level competency in Python and familiarity with C/C++\xa0', 'Experience with GIT and code review process', 'Experience in creating API’s.\xa0', 'Has shipped multiple machine learning products and has experience with the machine learning product lifecycle.', 'Nice to Have', 'As a Machine Learning Software Engineer, you will be responsible for productionizing computer vision and deep learning algorithms, converting generalized perception algorithms and approaches into functional perception products for industrial grade environments. You will work closely with the Director of Computer Vision, machine learning researchers, and application engineers, to transition perception capabilities from research and development to focused applications. You will also be supporting deep learning and computer vision research and development efforts, and using your experience in this area, to make contributions to them.\xa0', 'Dental Insurance', 'Experience with gRPC and Protobuf', 'Experience with deploying CUDA or OpenCL enabled applications', 'Experience with unit testing libraries such as PyTest, MyPy, and GTest.', 'About the Role', 'Knowledge of systems administration for linux systems.', 'Deep understanding of optical design', 'Rapid’s software provides our customers with an intuitive interface that gives them the tools to deploy and redeploy Rapid’s automated work cells on their manufacturing lines without having to be a robotics expert. To enable accessible and simple user-facing controls requires an extensive and specialized technology stack. Rapid’s platform is powered by AI and Computer Vision that drastically reduces the complexity, cost, and time typically required to set up a robotic arm. In short, we are automating the process for deploying manufacturing automation.', 'At Rapid Robotics our fantastic team is what makes us special. We are proudly committed to cultivating a culture of diversity, inclusion and connectedness that celebrates our differences in identity, experience, and point of view. We strive to create a workplace that reflects the communities we serve and empowers everyone to bring their full, authentic selves to work.\xa0', 'General experience with OpenCV in either a Python or C/C++ setting.', 'Experience with Docker development and deployment', 'Deep understanding of optical designFamiliar with using the Intel RealSense family of cameras.Experience with Docker development and deploymentExperience with deploying CUDA or OpenCL enabled applicationsExperience with cloud computing frameworks such as AWS and S3.Knowledge of systems administration for linux systems.Leading and/or major contributions to open source projectsGood understanding of asynchronous control flow, with notions of concurrency and memory managementExperience with gRPC and Protobuf', 'Rapid Robotics is an an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment based on race, color, sex, age, educational background, national origin, citizenship, marital status, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, lifestyle, veteran status, disability or any other federal, state or local protected class.\xa0', 'Familiar with using the Intel RealSense family of cameras.', 'Benefits', 'Rapid’s mission is to provide manufacturers a robotic solution that can be deployed against simple tasks in hours rather than weeks, and at a fraction of the cost of other automation solutions that require extensive manual programming. Our product is a fully integrated robotic arm work cell that is trained to perform tasks out of the box, and learns new tasks via our cloud infrastructure, AI, and Computer Vision.', '4+ years experience implementing machine learning algorithms in a production setting.Has shipped multiple machine learning products and has experience with the machine learning product lifecycle.At least 4 years of experience building applications using TensorFlow or Torch in either production or research settings.Expert level competency in Python and familiarity with C/C++\xa0General experience with OpenCV in either a Python or C/C++ setting.Experience in creating API’s.\xa0Experience with Linux development environment.Experience with unit testing libraries such as PyTest, MyPy, and GTest.Familiarity with interfacing with cameras and design elements of vision systems.Successful collaborations with both ML researchers and application developers.Experience with GIT and code review processConfidence being hands-on from requirements gathering & conceptualization, through prototyping, and into building the final product', 'Leading and/or major contributions to open source projects', 'About Rapid Robotics', 'Unlimited Vacation Policy', 'At least 4 years of experience building applications using TensorFlow or Torch in either production or research settings.', 'Experience with Linux development environment.', 'Confidence being hands-on from requirements gathering & conceptualization, through prototyping, and into building the final product', 'In this role, you will be interacting with common machine learning frameworks such as Torch, TensorFlow, etc. as well as leveraging our platform infrastructure to deploy models and perception algorithms. You will be working with our platform and applications team to create API’s for the machine learning features you will be deploying. You will interact with our broad and diverse team of Designers, Distributed Systems Engineers, Roboticists, and Mechanical Engineers. Ideally, you provide guidance and leadership in defining our machine learning infrastructure and perception strategy. You like to collaborate, ask questions and mentor as the team expands. The ideal candidate is a problem solver that loves to innovate with a passion for simplicity and technical excellence.']

job_text: ['', '2+ years of full stack experience using Python and Django\xa0', 'Provide estimates for your work.', 'Be in the code every day helping build new features and fixing issues.\xa0', 'Do PR reviews and give constructive feedback to other engineers on the team.\xa0', '\xa0Ability to balance focusing on output and meeting business needs with maintaining code quality.\xa0', 'Passionate about software development, you do this because you love it.\xa0', 'Attend daily standups and ad hoc meetings like design reviews.\xa0', 'You should have:', 'Company Description:', 'As a Software Engineer you will:\xa0', 'As a Software Engineer you will:\xa0Be in the code every day helping build new features and fixing issues.\xa0Do PR reviews and give constructive feedback to other engineers on the team.\xa0Attend daily standups and ad hoc meetings like design reviews.\xa0Collaborate closely with other engineers, product, and design.\xa0Provide estimates for your work.', '2+ years recent experience using React, bonus points if you have experience with Typescript, Postgres, Docker, or Kubernetes.', "Our technology helps senior care providers close the feedback loop with their employees and the seniors that they serve so they can make better decisions and provide better care. Today, our survey and analytics platform supports the voices of over half a million employees, seniors, and family members at over 4,000 locations. Now during the pandemic, we’re helping senior care providers understand their employees’ and their seniors' needs as they face unprecedented challenges. We’re a close-knit remote team that cares about working hard to do good in the world, while also making sure that we can all live balanced lives. As our user base grows, we’re looking for an experienced engineer to join our team to help scale our platform and expand our product offerings. We’re using data to transform the aging experience of our parents, our grandparents, our loved ones - and ultimately, for ourselves. Come join us!", 'Thrive when working remotely.\xa0', 'You love the small team startup environment and working hard and fast to have a big personal impact.\xa0', 'Collaborate closely with other engineers, product, and design.\xa0', '2+ years of full stack experience using Python and Django\xa02+ years recent experience using React, bonus points if you have experience with Typescript, Postgres, Docker, or Kubernetes.\xa0Ability to balance focusing on output and meeting business needs with maintaining code quality.\xa0Passionate about software development, you do this because you love it.\xa0You love the small team startup environment and working hard and fast to have a big personal impact.\xa0Thrive when working remotely.\xa0']

['', 'You’ve worked on feature development as both a member of a team and solo, and are comfortable taking on projects in both domains.', 'Go backend running within AWS.', 'We are looking for candidates with at least a year or two of professional experience building customer-facing products using React and/or React Native.', 'You’re comfortable taking a project and running with it solo — from design to testing and all the way to production. You can be the product manager, the designer, and the developer.', 'You have previous experience building backends using PHP/Go/Rust/Objective-C/Swift etc.', 'React (Typescript) frontend using Tailwind CSS for designs. You can be the product manager, the designer, and the developer.You get excited about doing user research, tracking down bottlenecks, and implementing changes to improve our services for both patients and providers.', 'About the hiring process:', 'Other indicators that you might be a good fit for the role:', 'We are looking for candidates with at least a year or two of professional experience building customer-facing products using React and/or React Native.Experience working with Go a plus but work with any similarly typed languages is also fine. We’re looking for comfort moving about and tinkering in such codebases.', 'You get excited about doing user research, tracking down bottlenecks, and implementing changes to improve our services for both patients and providers.', 'You’re happy with your basic design skills. You won’t be expected to design an entire site in Photoshop but having a solid grasp of padding, contrast, and color usage will be highly beneficial.', 'You have experience tinkering with React component optimization and writing tests for your code.', 'This role might be for you if:', 'Perlman Clinic is a growing primary and urgent care provider with many locations in San Diego, CA and we’re looking for a Senior Full Stack Engineer to join a young, exciting healthcare company. Projects to work on include telemedicine — we launched PocketDoc (pocketdocapp.com) —, patient engagement tools, and other focus areas. We are looking for someone who gets excited by API integrations, desktop apps, and mobile apps. Passion for innovation, a strong work ethic, and attention to detail are all important for this role.', 'Once you’ve cleared the initial phone screening we’ll send along a short questionnaire asking a few technical questions that will help us gauge if this will be a good position for you. After that, we’ll sit down for a face-to-face (Zoom) interview to get to know you better. As part of our process, you will also be sent a short programming challenge to complete using React after the initial face-to-face interview.', 'You have a passion for innovation and routinely think outside the box — taking an abstract idea and turning it into a functional tool.', 'Job requirements:', 'You have experience tinkering with React component optimization and writing tests for your code.You have previous experience building backends using PHP/Go/Rust/Objective-C/Swift etc.You’re happy with your basic design skills. We’re looking for comfort moving about and tinkering in such codebases.']

job_title: Full-Time: Senior Software Engineer - Enterprise Backend
job_text: ['', 'Provides expert-level technical guidance to product managers and designers', 'At least 10 years or more of experience in designing and implementing web applications, web services in Java and/or similar technologies.Deep understanding & knowledge of Computer Science fundamentals — data structures, algorithms and software fundamentals like SDLC, networking.Ability to write clean, robust, well designed, testable and maintainable code in Java 8 or later.Expert level knowledge of Java Collections Framework,Concurrency etc.Expertise in building web applications and web services using Spring Framework projects like Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Webflux, Security Reactive, etc.Strong knowledge & experience in designing and developing apis, micro services using Spring Boot and allied technologies.Strong experience with cloud native applications and cloud platforms like GCP and AWS - and/or on Netflix OSS stack.Good knowledge of Agile lifecycle methodologies: Agile, Scrum etc.Sound knowledge of source code management systems – like git, github, bitbucket, etc.Ability to mentor other engineers in the area of expertise.Ability to collaborate and communicate within a cross functional team.', 'Deep understanding & knowledge of Computer Science fundamentals — data structures, algorithms and software fundamentals like SDLC, networking.', 'Ability to independently design modules within defined software architectural paradigms.', 'Expert level knowledge of Java Collections Framework,Concurrency etc.', 'Strong knowledge & experience in designing and developing apis, micro services using Spring Boot and allied technologies.', 'Can act as a technical lead overseeing and allocating technical tasks to peers.', 'Reviews design proposals & code and provides feedback', 'Ability to write clean, robust, well designed, testable and maintainable code in Java 8 or later.', 'Expertise in building web applications and web services using Spring Framework projects like Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Webflux, Security Reactive, etc.', 'Job Summary', 'Evaluates software design, architecture and provides constructive feedback.', 'Ability to mentor other engineers in the area of expertise.', 'Mentor junior engineers by providing meaningful and actionable feedback in code reviews', 'Writes unit and integration tests and documentation.', 'Good knowledge of Agile lifecycle methodologies: Agile, Scrum etc.', 'Sound knowledge of source code management systems – like git, github, bitbucket, etc.', 'Strong experience with cloud native applications and cloud platforms like GCP and AWS - and/or on Netflix OSS stack.', 'Takes responsibility and leadership in implementing major sections of applications', 'Qualifications & Skills', 'Designs & builds cloud native web applications, web services and microservices and apis by internalizing the feature requirements, user experiences while applying Microservices Architecture and principles of software design using various design patterns.Writes unit and integration tests and documentation.Mentor junior engineers by providing meaningful and actionable feedback in code reviewsProvides expert-level technical guidance to product managers and designersReviews design proposals & code and provides feedbackAbility to independently design modules within defined software architectural paradigms.Evaluates software design, architecture and provides constructive feedback.Takes responsibility and leadership in implementing major sections of applicationsCan act as a technical lead overseeing and allocating technical tasks to peers.', 'Designs & builds cloud native web applications, web services and microservices and apis by internalizing the feature requirements, user experiences while applying Microservices Architecture and principles of software design using various design patterns.', 'Ability to collaborate and communicate within a cross functional team.', 'At least 10 years or more of experience in designing and implementing web applications, web services in Java and/or similar technologies.']

', 'Interfacing with developers, architects, and the infrastructure teams during upgrades or troubleshooting. Support the development of new customer digital policies and integrate them with the enterprise service. Interface with customers during digital policy creation, policy ingestion, policy integration, and testing. Support the implementation of an automated unit and integration testing capability for access control policies and other service components using JUnit. Have strong experience deploying software solutions in a cloud environment. Also assist in the creation of technical documentation and other routine programmatic and security accreditation artifacts. This work encompasses the full lifecycle of software management; from developing against new requirements, enhancement of existing requirements, and operating and maintaining deployed systems. Additionally, this role will also be responsible for performing routine maintenance on these solutions, as assigned each development sprint. Furthermore, this role will be responsible for leading the overall design and architecture of global business application projects and solutions and mentoring and training junior software engineers on the design and architecture, as well as Lindsay’s various software engineering processes, policies, and procedures. These projects and solutions will have a significant impact on global business processes and, in most cases, will be highly visible to customers, end users, and executives.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent technical education or equivalent experience.', 'Position Details', 'Lindsay Corporation is a global company, headquartered in Omaha, Nebraska, focused on providing irrigation and infrastructure solutions to meet the needs of a growing population. ['', 'You enjoy digging deep into fundamentally challenging CS and engineering problems.', 'You have mentored more junior engineers, interns, or teammates in a lasting and impactful manner.', 'Lightstep is an Equal Opportunity-Affirmative Action Employer – Minority / Female / Disability / Veteran / Gender Identity / Sexual Orientation.', "You've held a tech lead position in the past and enjoy coordinating with others to ensure complex engineering projects are done well.", 'Lightstep enables teams to detect and resolve regressions quickly, regardless of system scale or complexity. We integrate seamlessly into daily workflows, whether you are proactively optimizing performance or investigating a root cause so you can quickly get back to building features. We continue to grow our talented, low-ego, team! We believe that we should always align our actions toward a common purpose, that trust is paramount and must be cultivated, that the most valuable team members multiply rather than add, and that we shouldn’t take ourselves too seriously (except when we’re writing way-too-long sentences about our values). We believe that assembling and retaining an inclusive and diverse team is the best way to grow a successful company.', 'You have experience outside of engineering: marketing, sales, design, management, etc.', '\ufeffBonus points if…', "You’re motivated by high-impact projects, whether they’re open-ended questions or immediate practical needs, that drive a business's bottom line.", '\xa0', 'You’ve worked on large-scale distributed systems, security, performance, and/or microservice-based architectures.', "You've developed in, or look forward to, learning Go.You've held a tech lead position in the past and enjoy coordinating with others to ensure complex engineering projects are done well.You have experience outside of engineering: marketing, sales, design, management, etc.You contribute to open source projects, enjoy giving talks, and/or do community-building work.You have mentored more junior engineers, interns, or teammates in a lasting and impactful manner.", 'You’d be a great addition if…', 'We care deeply about building long term careers and offer opportunities for Software Engineers to grow towards project leadership, engineering management, or other roles in our developing business. In addition, we highly encourage (and have frequently supported) our engineers who give talks at conferences, organize local events, and mentor developing engineers.', 'You value EQ as much as, if not more than, IQ in your teammates.', "As a Software Engineer, you’ll play a pivotal role in shaping new product offerings and scaling a sophisticated system, while working closely with our other engineers. We're looking for someone excited to join a growing team that writes efficient, maintainable code for a standout product used every day by engineers at Lyft, Twilio, and more.", "You're excited to work on a tool that other developers rely on for their 5 9's and firefighting!", "You enjoy digging deep into fundamentally challenging CS and engineering problems.You’re motivated by high-impact projects, whether they’re open-ended questions or immediate practical needs, that drive a business's bottom line.You value EQ as much as, if not more than, IQ in your teammates.You'd enjoy working on a cross-functional team alongside designers, DevOps, UI engineers, and product managers.You’ve worked on large-scale distributed systems, security, performance, and/or microservice-based architectures.You're excited to work on a tool that other developers rely on for their 5 9's and firefighting!", 'We created Lightstep because we understand the massive architectural transformation underway in the software industry, and we saw an opportunity to accelerate it, all while improving the quality of the developer and end-user experience. While we learned a great deal from our experiences building Dapper (Google’s distributed tracing solution) and Monarch (Google’s high-availability metrics solution), Lightstep is in many ways a reaction to and a generational improvement beyond those approaches. Our story as individuals and as a company revolves around continuous learning, careful listening, and the belief that these fundamentally new software architectures require fundamentally new solutions.', "You've developed in, or look forward to, learning Go.", "You'd enjoy working on a cross-functional team alongside designers, DevOps, UI engineers, and product managers.", 'You contribute to open source projects, enjoy giving talks, and/or do community-building work.']

['', 'As our co-founders transitioned from military to civilian life, they encountered barriers and inefficiencies navigating the most basic health and social services. ['Participate as an empowered member of a collaborative agile team to design, develop and maintain high performance applications.Leverage continuous deployment and test automation tools in order to deploy application changes to production on average more than once per day.Interact with internal and external customers to understand their needs and lead the development of web applications to meet those needs.Implement rich, interactive web applications using the latest technologies, frameworks, and patterns.Leverage web analytics as needed to support Product Discovery and to measure project KPIs.Test, measure, and optimize performance using Application Performance Management Tools.', 'Skills, Experience, and Characteristics', 'Proven experience in Object Oriented programming using Java.Proven experience designing and developing RESTful Services and web applicationsExperience using profiling tools to analyze and optimize application performance like App Dynamics and New Relic.Familiar with full web technology stack (e.g., HTTP, cookies, headers, caching, CDN, and security).Willingness and ability to learn new approaches and emerging technology quicklyStrong communication and interpersonal skills.Strong problem solving skillsDetail oriented.Familiarity with unit testing and TDD practices.Experience with Agile methodologies like Scrum or Kanban.', 'Implement rich, interactive web applications using the latest technologies, frameworks, and patterns.', 'Learn more about Working at ITHAKA.', 'Familiarity with unit testing and TDD practices.', 'Interested candidates can submit their resume, and salary requirements.', 'Agile teams that follow continuous deployment and test automation best practices allowing for rapid application development and frequent deployments. We complete over 200 production deployments each week.', 'Work for ITHAKA', '\xa0', 'Experience with Agile methodologies like Scrum or Kanban.', 'Proven experience designing and developing RESTful Services and web applications', 'Familiar with full web technology stack (e.g., HTTP, cookies, headers, caching, CDN, and security).', 'Detail oriented.', 'As the Software Engineer for ITHAKA’s JSTOR Development team, You will be designing, developing and maintaining applications that are deployed on our cloud- delivered platform and powered by our APIs.\xa0 You will be a crucial part of a dynamic, energized and agile team delivering leading-edge solutions that are used across the globe by millions of visitors each month.\xa0', 'Strong communication and interpersonal skills.', 'Our team is passionate about our mission and supporting one another.\xa0 We enjoy working together to create opportunities for people to learn and grow out in the world, and we bring that same commitment to helping our teammates develop in our careers and our lives.\xa0 One of our core values is belonging. We embrace differences, and believe that the things that make each of us unique are the things that help us see new insights and build better solutions.\xa0', 'Willingness and ability to learn new approaches and emerging technology quickly', 'The primary responsibilities of our developers include:', 'This is a unique opportunity to be on the leading edge of building large-scale, cloud- delivered web applications that host hundreds of millions of sessions annually.\xa0', 'Experience using profiling tools to analyze and optimize application performance like App Dynamics and New Relic.', 'Developers are using the same architecture, technologies, and tools as companies like Netflix, Etsy, and Amazon.com.', 'The Role', 'Proven experience in Object Oriented programming using Java.', 'Apply Now:', 'Strong problem solving skills', 'Our organization and this role will provide you with an opportunity few other companies can offer including:', 'You will spend time learning about the business, learning new technology and working with other teams to develop strong solutions to our problems.', 'Leverage continuous deployment and test automation tools in order to deploy application changes to production on average more than once per day.', 'Test, measure, and optimize performance using Application Performance Management Tools.', 'Interact with internal and external customers to understand their needs and lead the development of web applications to meet those needs.', 'Mid-Senior Level', 'Ann Arbor, MI', 'Software Engineer', 'Leverage web analytics as needed to support Product Discovery and to measure project KPIs.', 'Participate as an empowered member of a collaborative agile team to design, develop and maintain high performance applications.', 'We are a goal-driven organization with a focus on application quality and performance. Our teams thrive in this environment due to our commitment to overcome our failures and build upon our successes.\xa0', 'Specific Objectives and Responsibilities', 'We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer.\xa0 All qualified applicants receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, sex, national origin, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, religion, domestic violence victim status, veteran status, disability, history of disability or perceived disability, or other status protected by law.\xa0', 'When joining the development team at JSTOR, you can expect to receive tool and product training. We have an excellent on-boarding program, which enables new engineers to become productive very quickly. A lead will work closely with you as you begin engaging your assigned agile team.\xa0 We will provide you with constant support as we work to make you comfortable in your new environment. Those in leadership roles will work tirelessly to set you up for success.', 'The successful candidate will have applicable development experience, experience with large-scale distributed web applications, a high degree of intellectual curiosity, excellent problem-solving skills and strong communication and interpersonal skills.\xa0 We look for candidates that possess strong debugging skills, a passion for best practices, and the ability to optimize code for clarity and reliability as well as performance.', 'Leveraging technologies including AWS, Java, Python, and Docker.', 'Leveraging technologies including AWS, Java, Python, and Docker.Agile teams that follow continuous deployment and test automation best practices allowing for rapid application development and frequent deployments. We complete over 200 production deployments each week.Developers are using the same architecture, technologies, and tools as companies like Netflix, Etsy, and Amazon.com.This is a unique opportunity to be on the leading edge of building large-scale, cloud- delivered web applications that host hundreds of millions of sessions annually.\xa0']

Business demands may require ASML to proceed with applicants who are immediately eligible to access controlled technology.”Job DescriptionCreates content proposal based on Product Marketing product definition for Compute Platform related products.Defines and aligns the x-domain/sector/product functional requirements, design and test specifications for HMI Compute PlatformsOversee system design with focus on system layout, fab and E-beam system interfacing, modularity and extendibilityDefines and aligns internal and external requirements for product deployment and remote analytics development capability.Aligns and incorporates x-product team functionality in the platform definition and rollout plans to ensure ASML has a cohesive technical strategy for computational infrastructureOwns the technology roadmap, in collaboration with the responsible Functional Architects relevant to the technology.Signals architecture misalignment and organizes/prepares (4 o’clock) meetings to set direction.Deliverables: Feasibility Test Definitions, Product Feasibility Reports, product performance specifications and design specifications, system level alpha test definition and acceptance reports, technology roadmap.Prepares technical input to key program decisions for review by senior executives. Manage system engineering deliverables to the product generation process such as identification of key technical risks, system performance projections and status of the overall architecture development.Responsible for optimal functional integration of subsystems into the whole product (guiding the product integration plan).EducationAcademic level (Master or PhD) in Information technology, Software, Physics, Mathematics or any Technical areaExperienceMinimum 8 years of experience in related fields is a plus for candidates, including IC manufacturing, semiconductor process technology, e-beam inspection/metrology, or equivalent experience.Hands-on Experience On Semiconductor Process Or Equipment Is RequiredFast learner with strong self-motivation to grow technically; be able to perform job at high standard with minimum supervision, and demonstrated ability to thrive in a high pressure and fast paced environment.Personal skillsCommunication skills: Able to communicate with counterparts efficiently on project work.Team work: Good team player to drive product development with stakeholders. Practically, this involves some system administration, as well as creation and configuration of RTOS kernels and development environments.\xa0You are responsible to ensure that the RTI Connext Micro/Cert software is available and optimized to run on a large set of platforms. In other cases, this involves porting and implementing the RTI OS abstraction layer to the target RTOS. You benchmark and tune our real-time middleware for optimal performance on the target platform. ['Necessary Qualifications:\xa0', 'We know that innovation thrives on product teams where diverse points of view come together to solve hard problems in ways that are just now possible. As such, we explicitly seek people that bring diverse life experiences, diverse educational backgrounds, diverse cultures, and diverse work experiences.\xa0', 'Our\xa0product managers that are not afraid of signing up for results, even when this means they\xa0must\xa0work through others to achieve the necessary results.\xa0You will need to be able to influence your teammates, as well as colleagues, stakeholders, and key executives, through your use of data and logic.\xa0', 'Our\xa0product teams solve hard problems – customer problems and business problems – in ways that our customers love\xa0and\xa0yet work for our business. Our product teams are cross-functional and durable, generally comprised of a product manager, a product designer, and several engineers.\xa0', 'Demonstrated understanding of the techniques and methods of modern product discovery and product delivery.\xa0', 'We staff our product teams with the skills necessary to come up with effective solutions that are\u202fvaluable\u202f(our customers choose to buy or use),\u202fviable\u202f(the solution works within the many constraints of the business),\u202fusable\u202f(the user can figure out how to use) and\u202ffeasible\u202f(our engineers have the skills and technology to implement).\xa0', 'Diverse Perspectives:', 'Demonstrated ability to figure out solutions to hard problems with many constraints, using sound judgement to assess risks, and to lay out your argument in a well-structured, data-informed, written narrative.\xa0', '\xa0', 'Necessary Qualifications:', 'Bachelor’s degree.\xa0Demonstrated understanding of the techniques and methods of modern product discovery and product delivery.\xa05\xa0years working on technology-powered products as either a product manager, product designer, engineer, data analyst, data scientist, or user researcher.\xa0Demonstrated ability to figure out solutions to hard problems with many constraints, using sound judgement to assess risks, and to lay out your argument in a well-structured, data-informed, written narrative.\xa0Proven ability to engage with engineers, designers, and company leaders in a constructive and collaborative relationship.\xa0', 'feasible', 'We look for product managers that understand that consistent innovation is the result of each member of the product team contributing their passion and their ideas. The product manager must collaborate closely with her product designer and engineers to discover effective solutions, and then work together to deliver those solutions to market.\xa0', 'viable', 'Proven ability to engage with engineers, designers, and company leaders in a constructive and collaborative relationship.\xa0', 'Diverse Perspectives:\xa0', 'Our\xa0product manager must contribute to\xa0their\xa0product team a solid knowledge of the various constraints of the business – constraints from marketing, sales, service, finance, legal, and privacy are typical examples. The product manager must also contribute to the product team a deep knowledge of our users and customers, and the data about how our customers engage with our products. Finally,\xa0our\xa0product managers\xa0are\xa0expected to track industry trends and the competitive landscape as they pertain to her product.\xa0', '5\xa0years working on technology-powered products as either a product manager, product designer, engineer, data analyst, data scientist, or user researcher.\xa0', 'Bachelor’s degree.\xa0', 'valuable', 'usable']

regression / test cycles and execute them as needed.', '4+ years of hands on experience with programming and scripting languages such as Python, R, C++, shell and RDBMS (SQL or Oracle) and software dev/QA in Linux environment.', 'Privacy Notice for Job Applicants', 'Participate in requirements and design review meetings to create comprehensive, automated test strategies/plans for bioinformatics software leading to successful implementation and timely project completion.', 'Experience working in a regulated environment (CLIA, CAP, NYDOH, and FDA) preferred', 'Minimum with a BS Degree in on experience in scripting, running, analyzing, and refining automation frameworks for comprehensive and full application testing, including API testing.4+ years of experience in verifying algorithms, used in CLIA, CAP, NYDOH, and FDA regulated environments.Participate in requirements and design review meetings to create comprehensive, automated test strategies/plans for bioinformatics software leading to successful implementation and timely project completion.Work with the algorithm development team to understand functional specifications, identify and design test cases for sequence analysis software including alignment, variant calling, and annotation software.Work with cross-functional teams, and support integration and regression testing of Bioinformatics software.Execute maintainability.', 'Employee may be required to lift routine office supplies and use office equipment. Majority of the work is performed in a desk/office environment; however, there may be exposure to high noise levels, fumes, and biohazard material in the laboratory environment. Ability to sit for extended periods of time.', 'Guardant Health is an Equal Opportunity Employer. will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.', 'Company Description', 'Provide written documentation and specifications of software products and services.', 'Work with the algorithm development team to understand functional specifications, identify and design test cases for sequence analysis software including alignment, variant calling, and annotation software.', bioinformatics tools e.g. samtools, picard, snpEff.', 'Work with bioinformatics SQA engineers and members of the bioinformatics group to develop test cases that ensure the quality of bioinformatics software used in CLIA, CAP, NYDOH, and FDA regulated environments.', 'Essential Duties And Responsibilities', 'Job Description', 'Provide coaching to other team members for designing test strategies and test cases with strong knowledge of molecular biology, oncology and bioinformatics.', 'Excellent organization and people skills with the ability to work across functions to ensure successful comprehensive and full application testing, including API testing.', 'All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.', 'Design, create, enhance, and maintain runtime tools such as Docker', '4+ years of experience in verifying algorithms, workflow or data analysis software.']

["Beacon Hill Technologies, Beacon Hill Staffing Group's technology specialty division is a national IT staffing organization, operating across industries, that provides contract, direct (permanent), consulting and project management services to top companies and their IT departments.", ' ', "Find Us on Facebook!Follow Us on Twitter!Beacon Hill is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values the strength diversity brings to the workplace. Individuals with Disabilities and Protected Veterans are encouraged to apply.Company Profile:Beacon Hill Technologies, a premier National Information Technology Staffing Group, provides world class technology talent across all industries utilizing a complete suite of staffing services.  Beacon Hill Technologies' dedicated team of recruiting and staffing experts consistently delivers quality IT professionals to solve our customers' technical and business needs. Beacon Hill Technologies covers a broad spectrum of IT positions, including Project Management and Business Analysis, Programming/Development, Database, Infrastructure, Quality Assurance, Production/Support and ERP roles.Learn more about Beacon Hill Staffing Group and our specialty divisions, Beacon Hill Associates, Beacon Hill Financial, Beacon Hill HR, Beacon Hill Legal, Beacon Hill Life Sciences and Beacon Hill Technologies by visiting www.beaconhillstaffing.com. We look forward to working with you.Beacon Hill. Employing the Future™", 'In an effort to build tooling required for database and systems automation, we are looking to bring on a person to augment the current development team. This opportunity calls for a person with an Oracle DBA background as well as being well versed in developing scripts and utilizing configuration management tools for automating infrastructure/environmental change. This team is also responsible for operation-wide inventory, licensing, and automation analytics to IT Management via dashboards and reporting.   Role requirements * Engage with development teams in both an advisory and contributor role on automation solutions that focus on the Oracle DB platform * Collaborate with operational teams to advise and establish standards that enable automation capabilities * Contribute as an Oracle expert to the design, implementation, support, and continuous improvement of an enterprise star-schema data warehouse, data mart, and analytics solution * Collaborate with various internal teams to develop the necessary ETLs that provide data warehouse content and for the delivery of analytics * Provide clear, concise, and organized documentation to establish and maintain standards and procedures  Experience * Experience in scripting languages such as Perl/Python/Bash * Strong SQL query knowledge and experience in developing solutions in Oracle PL/SQL * Experience with clustered/HA database architecture including Oracle ASM and RAC * High level of experience (5+ years) provisioning, patching, administering and supporting Oracle databases in DBA role * Understanding of DevOps practices and techniques such as Continuous Testing & Integration (CI/CD), Continuous delivery. * Understanding of SDLC and DevOps related tooling, such as Github/Bitbucket, Ansible, Puppet/Chef, Jenkins or similar tools * Experience importing/transforming data from disparate sources such as for data warehousing (ETL) * Ability to work well in a team environment, as well as maintaining a flexible attitude are a must * Ability to quickly diagnose the problem areas and come up with solutions and/or workarounds. ']

job_text: ['', 'Passionate in system software and technical innovations.', 'Comfortable in working with global teams geographically distributed.', 'Role description', 'Working site: Palo Alto, California', 'Good communication skills in both writing and presenting.', 'Technical qualifications', 'Requirements', 'Technical qualifications:', 'Role description: ', 'Degrees with majors related to computing technologies.', 'Good knowledge of automotive communication/control protocols, such as CAN, Ethernet, DDS.', 'In-depth knowledge of Android or ROS, QNX, Linux or other operating system
